"I wish to explore the Fallen Immortal Realm, and I have a feeling that the pill you are refining might be helpful. Hence, my inquiry."

Chen Ying exclaimed, "Is the art of deduction really that mysterious..."

"Wait, could you be that ancient cultivator from the Heavenly Mechanism Sect who woke up from slumber?"

At that moment, seeing Li Fan's name, Chen Ying suddenly recalled something and asked in surprise.

"Haha, that's me, but it's just an empty reputation. You don't need to take it seriously!" Li Fan responded humbly.

But Chen Ying was thoroughly intrigued.

He insisted on meeting Li Fan in person and even offered to give him some Ice Intent Heartless Pills for free.

Feigning reluctance, Li Fan eventually agreed.

They arranged to meet at Chen Ying's residence on Ten Thousand Immortal Island.

It was well known that cultivators could purchase caves on Ten Thousand Immortal Island to live in.

However, the price was not cheap.

None of the Congyun Sea cultivators Li Fan had befriended in previous lifetimes had indulged in such luxury.

Even Zhang Zhiliang hadn't splurged on a residence to enjoy himself.

"It seems alchemy is more profitable than formations," Li Fan mused as he arrived in front of Chen Ying's cave.

Sensing Li Fan's arrival, a green door suddenly opened.

What seemed like a simple, small residence from the outside turned out to be an entirely different world upon entering.

It was like stepping into a valley, where many different kinds of herbs and spiritual plants grew in the extensive spirit fields.

The concentration of spiritual energy in the valley wasn't particularly high, and Li Fan didn't see anyone tending to the plants.

Yet all these spiritual herbs and plants were thriving.

Li Fan guessed that it might have something to do with the layers of different colored restrictions that enveloped the spirit fields.

"Ah, Daoist Li Fan, you finally made it!" Chen Ying's hearty laughter echoed from afar.

Li Fan looked over and saw him emerging from a patch of crops taller than a person.

Ignoring his somewhat disheveled appearance, Chen Ying flew straight toward Li Fan.

"Eight Mystical Grass... but the ordinary kind isn't usually this tall."

"I've heard that Chen Ying is not only skilled in alchemy but also very adept at cultivating spiritual plants. Seeing it today, his reputation is well-deserved."

Li Fan's mind became more active.

"Daoist Chen Ying, it's a pleasure to meet you!" He greeted warmly with cupped hands.

Suddenly, his expression changed, and he stared intently at Chen Ying.

Chen Ying was taken aback and touched his face, feeling puzzled.

"What's the matter, Daoist Li Fan?"

Seeing Li Fan's serious expression, he couldn't help but ask.

"I observed your face and feared that you might face a bloody disaster in the near future!" Li Fan shook his head and said in a deep tone.

Chapter 449: Knowing the Heavens and Defying Them

"Bloody Disaster?" Chen Ying was taken aback, watching Li Fan's serious expression.

"Where did you get that idea?" Chen Ying asked, half-believing, half-doubting, as he had not expected this ancient Heavenly Mechanism Sect cultivator to give him such a surprise upon their first meeting.

Li Fan didn't immediately answer. Instead, he closed his eyes, furrowed his brows, and started calculating with his fingers.

Seeing this, Chen Ying stood aside, not daring to disturb him.

The divination lasted for as long as it takes an incense stick to burn.

Li Fan's breathing was erratic, and his face grew paler by the minute.

This made Chen Ying nervous as well.

Suddenly, Li Fan opened his eyes and spat out a mouthful of blood.

"Fellow Daoist Li Fan, are you alright?" Chen Ying was startled and stepped forward to check on him.

"It's nothing serious, just a little backlash," Li Fan wiped the blood from the corner of his mouth and waved his hand.

Before Chen Ying could react, Li Fan looked at him intently and asked, "Fellow Daoist Chen, are you planning to go on a long journey soon?"

Chen Ying was first stunned, then shocked.

Not long ago, he had indeed received orders from headquarters to go to a newly discovered wood-element cave.

But he hadn't mentioned this to anyone yet, so how did Li Fan know?

Could it be that he really saw something through his divination?

Chen Ying quickly took out a Vital Qi Consolidation Pill and handed it to Li Fan.

"Fellow Daoist, please take this pill; it can help alleviate your injuries."

After Li Fan swallowed it and his complexion improved, Chen Ying asked solemnly, "It's true; I do have to leave Congyun Sea soon. Is the blood calamity you mentioned related to this journey?"

Li Fan slowly nodded, "If you return early, it should be fine. The longer you stay outside, the more dangerous it will become."

Chen Ying's heart sank.

This mission would definitely take at least ten years, if not longer, to complete.

Does that mean that if he goes, he is doomed to face great danger?

The thought of defying orders crossed Chen Ying's mind.

But it was only a thought.

The orders from the headquarters of the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance were not something a small Nascent Soul cultivator like him could refuse.

Is there no escape, only a path to death?

No wonder he'd been feeling uneasy recently but couldn't pinpoint the reason.

It turned out to be this!

Chen Ying's face turned extremely grim.

After a moment, he looked at Li Fan, who was standing nearby, and had an idea.

"This journey cannot be avoided; I beg you, fellow Daoist, to save me!" Chen Ying pleaded with a hopeful expression.

Li Fan sighed softly, "Understanding the will of heaven is easy; defying it is difficult. I can barely glimpse the secrets of the future, but to change one's fate against the heavens... that's..."

"You're asking a lot from me."

"However, I can give you some advice."

"I can't guarantee it will work, but you can try."

Just as Chen Ying was feeling extremely disappointed, Li Fan suddenly changed his tone.

Chen Ying was overjoyed, "Please tell me, fellow Daoist!"

Li Fan first sized up Chen Ying, then asked, "Forgive me for being blunt, but in a life-and-death struggle, how strong are you?"

Chen Ying's face showed some embarrassment, "As they say, 'each to their own expertise.' I'm good at alchemy and nurturing plants... but fighting..."

Chen Ying shook his head.

Li Fan asked again, "If you were ambushed, how strong is your ability to protect yourself? Do you have any defense mechanisms, stealth techniques, or escape methods prepared?"

"The Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance has been peaceful for a long time, and I’ve always been on good terms with others. I didn't think I'd need those things..." Chen Ying answered honestly.

Li Fan sighed deeply, "That's it! You have no sense of caution. If disaster strikes suddenly and you're unprepared, you're bound to fall."

"If this calamity cannot be avoided, you'll have to face it head-on."

"I see that you're wealthy enough to buy such a cave dwelling on Ten Thousand Immortal Island. The only way now is to spend money to avoid disaster!"

"In the Tianxuan Mirror, there are many defensive treasures and techniques. You must not be stingy; buy as much as you can and strengthen yourself."

"If you can hold off an attack from a cultivator of the Dao Integration stage for even a moment, you might find a chance to survive."

Li Fan spoke earnestly.

"The attack of an Dao Integration stage immortal Sage?" Chen Ying was startled.

With the contribution points he had accumulated over the years, he might be able to afford one or two treasures that could withstand an Dao Integration Stage attack.

But those were meant for him to exchange for an Dao Integration Stage cultivation method.

If the calamity Li Fan mentioned didn't happen, it would be a huge waste of contribution points.

He'd have to start from scratch again.

"Isn't this a bit..." Chen Ying couldn't help but ask, but he saw Li Fan subtly shake his head.

"I've said all I can. Whether you believe it or not is up to you. It has nothing to do with me now."

Li Fan turned to leave.

Chen Ying hurriedly stopped him.

"Fellow Daoist, you came in such a hurry; how can you leave in such a hurry? Your life-saving grace will be repaid later. For now, let me show you some hospitality!" Suppressing all his conflicting thoughts, Chen Ying took Li Fan on a tour of his cave dwelling.

After introducing him to the unique forbidden method he had developed for nurturing spiritual plants, Chen Ying personally refined a batch of pills in front of Li Fan.

During their conversations, Chen Ying discovered that this man truly was an ancient cultivator.

His knowledge was vast, and although he didn't specialize in alchemy, his understanding of herbal properties was profound, with some insights even benefiting Chen Ying.

Li Fan stayed in Chen Ying's cave dwelling for seven days before finally taking his leave, much to Chen Ying's reluctance.

Before departing, Chen Ying generously gifted a bottle of Insight Enlighten Pills to Li Fan.

This pill was specially refined by him and had remarkable effects when used during the breakthrough from the Golden Core to the Nascent Soul stage.

The materials were rare, and the success rate was extremely low.

Chen Ying himself didn't have much in stock and usually didn't sell them, instead using them as gifts in special circumstances.

He only gave it to Li Fan because he noticed that Li Fan's cultivation had recovered to the late Golden Core stage and that he was about to form his Nascent Soul again—a gesture of reciprocation.

"This man is not a fraud; he truly has real knowledge."

After sending Li Fan off, Chen Ying pondered to himself.

"A blood calamity..."

"It's just some contribution points. If I lose them, I can earn more. At worst, I'll just have to work harder and refine more pills."

"But if I die, everything is over."

"It's better to believe in it than not."

With this in mind, Chen Ying made up his mind.

He opened the Tianxuan Mirror in his cave dwelling and began searching.

...

"I wonder if Chen Ying will survive."

After leaving the cave dwelling, with multiple restrictions in place, the formless killing intent lost its ability to track Chen Ying precisely.

It could only faintly sense his presence.

"It's all up to him now."

Li Fan stopped thinking about it, left the residential area on Ten Thousand Immortal Island, and returned to the Tianxuan Mirror.

"If I didn't know that the entire Congyun Sea would disappear soon, I would definitely buy a cave dwelling myself."

Feeling the relatively cramped space in the Tianxuan Mirror, Li Fan couldn't help but have this thought.

Chapter 450: Forging the Mysterious Bird in the Furnace

It wasn’t purely for enjoyment but rather to better align with the identity of the [Heavenly Mechanism Sect Cultivator] as an investment master.

After all, with your ability to double the capital every two years, it wouldn’t make much sense to be crammed into the Tianxuan Mirror like an ordinary cultivator.

Though it could be explained by claiming a reclusive nature.

However, considering the possible publicity effect of "purchasing a cave on the the Ten Thousand Immortal Island shortly after joining the the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance", Li Fan really had the idea of ​​purchasing a cave dwelling.

After searching for a while, he had no choice but to give up.

The reason was simple—contribution points alone weren’t enough.

Not only was there a requirement for a certain level of Authority requirement within the the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance, but one also needed to obtain a [Residence Permit] issued by the Administration Hall of the Island to be eligible to purchase a cave dwelling there.

This residence permit is generally only granted to cultivators who have made special contributions to the local branch of the the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance.

However, it is said that there are additional channels through which one can privately purchase such a permit, though it’s unclear whether this is true.

“It’s better to stay in the Tianxuan Mirror for now.”

Li Fan dismissed the idea.

He took out the [Insight Enlighten Pill] that Chen Ying had just given him, swallowed it in one go, and carefully felt the changes occurring within himself.

Its effect was somewhat similar to the Enlightenment Pill.

However, the Enlightenment Pill is more comprehensive, aiding in the comprehension of cultivation techniques, deduction of secret arts, or breakthroughs in cultivation levels.

This insight Enlighten Pill, on the other hand, only shows its effects when Li Fan wants to make a breakthrough in his cultivation.

“It’s like a low-end, specialized version of the Enlightenment Pill.”

“Enlightenment Pills are hard to come by within the the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance, so this Insight Enlighten Pill isn’t bad either.”

To avoid wasting the pill’s effect, Li Fan seized the time it lasted and began cultivating.

It was unclear how much time had passed before Li Fan was abruptly awakened by an inexplicable sensation in his heart.

It turned out that the restrictions on entering the Fallen Immortal Realm had lifted, and he could go there again.

"It seems like this retreat was more immersive than usual. I only felt like I closed my eyes for a moment, but so much time has passed."

“There’s indeed some value here.”

“Such talent... I hope he can survive this calamity.”

With this thought, Li Fan began setting up a ritual in the surroundings.

"Blessings to the Heavenly Venerable Xuanhuang!" he murmured. The next moment, the world spun around him, and Li Fan found himself descending back into the Fallen Immortal Realm.

As expected, his entire body was enveloped in a mysterious liquid, surrounded by darkness.

He had once again become the *Heavenly Fate Mystical Bird* still inside its eggshell.

Fatigue and weakness pervaded him.

Li Fan tried his best to absorb the surrounding liquid, striving to stay awake.

While doing so, he pondered his options.

"From the experience of Ye Feipeng in my previous life, the Creation furnace Technique is effective even for creatures like demonic beasts."

"Although my body is currently too fragile, and forcibly invoking the hidden power might cause a backlash I can't handle,"

"But with Xu Ke watching over me, it should be fine."

"I might as well give it a try. If it doesn't work out, I can always start over."

In an instant, Li Fan made up his mind.

Focusing his thoughts, it was as if he wielded a massive hammer, striking hard at the force within him.

"Eh? What's happening?"

A searing power suddenly erupted from within, seemingly burning everything.

Li Fan’s consciousness was about to dissolve when, in a daze, he seemed to hear Xu Ke's faint exclamation.

He then fell into silence.

After an unknown amount of time, Li Fan gradually regained consciousness.

Instinctively checking his condition, he found that he was several times stronger than before he had passed out.

The hidden power he had initially activated surged from every part of his body, transforming the Mystical Bird.

The liquid in the dark space around him also seemed to contain another form of energy.

Tiny specks of red light, resembling flames, began to appear.

"Not bad, Xu Ke."

Li Fan greedily swallowed a few gulps and immediately felt more energized.

"This is…"

The taste of the red specks was strikingly similar to a certain fruit that Xu Ke had fed the Heavenly Fate Mystical Bird in a previous life.

"A great tonic, Xu Ke, you really are resourceful. No wonder you're favored by fate."

Li Fan was finally at ease.

After fully digesting the energy he had consumed and feeling that his body was in peak condition, Li Fan once again focused his thoughts and unleashed the hidden power within.

"What's happening again?"

Just before passing out, Li Fan vaguely heard Xu Ke's miserable cry.

True to his word, Xu Ke exerted himself again and managed to save the dying Heavenly Fate Mystical Bird.

In this way, Li Fan fearlessly and without hesitation continued to practice the Creation Furnace Technique.

Whenever he couldn’t endure it anymore, Xu Ke's seemingly otherworldly luck would lead him to find a solution.

After repeating this process seven times, the surrounding liquid was entirely absorbed, and Li Fan felt it was time.

Letting out a loud cry, Li Fan clawed at the eggshell.

Fine cracks spread out, and then light appeared.

Li Fan broke through the shell.

After devouring the broken eggshell, Li Fan looked at the stunned Xu Ke beside him, fluttered his wings, and made a home in his hair.

"Oh no, oh no, I haven't completed the Spirit Beast Art's bonding, and it's already hatched?"

"Did I raise it to be useless?"

Xu Ke lamented, muttering to himself.

Li Fan unceremoniously gave him a claw, conveying the message that he was hungry.

Xu Ke yelped in surprise and had no choice but to take Li Fan into the forest to search for food.

As Li Fan practiced the Creation Furnace Technique, he also sensed the connection between himself and Xu Ke.

A thread of cold energy subtly flowed through his body, beyond his control, and seemed to resonate with Xu Ke beneath him.

Had it not been for Li Fan’s practice of the Creation Furnace Technique and the initial control over his body it provided, he might never have noticed it.

It was this thread of cold energy that made Li Fan feel a slight sense of closeness to Xu Ke.

However, since Li Fan had independently broken out of his shell in this life, the kind of unbreakable bond had not yet formed.

"So this is the Beast Taming Art?"

Li Fan mused.

He then gave Xu Ke another hard claw, causing him to cry out in pain.

Li Fan resumed his cultivation of the *Heaven's Mandate is Mine* divine power.

As he absorbed the luck that overflowed from Xu Ke, Li Fan felt invigorated.

Under the dual enhancement of the *Creation Furnace Technique* and the *Heaven's Mandate is Mine*, although he was just born, Li Fan's strength rapidly increased.

Moreover, perhaps due to the reversed cultivation path in his previous life, which had strengthened his soul and will, Li Fan was now less influenced by the emotions and nature of the Mystical Bird.

At least, he no longer experienced uncontrollable behavior.

More than a month later, while Xu Ke was not paying attention, Li Fan tested his abilities on some wild demonic beasts in the mountains.

Ordinary demonic beasts in the Qi condensation stage were no longer his match.

One day, as Xu Ke was foraging with Li Fan as usual, they were suddenly stopped by an uninvited guest.

It was none other than Song Yang, who had been eyeing the Heavenly Fate Mystical Bird.

Sensing the gaze of the black two-headed snake coiled around Song Yang’s neck, Li Fan sneered.

A faint killing intent solidified and rushed toward it.

The black two-headed snake immediately trembled and curled into a ball.

Chapter 451: Finally Meeting Mr. Bai

Song Yang immediately noticed the abnormality in his companion spirit beast and was instantly horrified.

He hadn't expected that the Heavenly Fate Mystical Bird, which had just been born, could suppress the two-headed black snake merely through its aura.

Watching the bird nestled in Xu Ke's thick hair, Song Yang's eyes gleamed with greed.

However, he knew better than to rely on the black two-headed snake; it seemed he would need to find another way.

With a cold snort, Song Yang calmed his spirit beast and turned away.

Having turned a crisis into nothing, Li Fan yawned and curled back into his "nest."

Meanwhile, Xu Ke scratched his head, looking puzzled and confused.

Time continued to flow, and the power of the bird that Li Fan had transformed into kept growing.

Soon, it reached its first point of transformation.

Its pitch-black feathers had grown all over its body, and perhaps due to absorbing Xu Ke's fortune since childhood, a strand of purple-gold was mixed in.

Because of the training in the Creation Furnace Cultivation technique, which allowed for control over its body, it didn't grow in size, remaining small enough to sleep in Xu Ke's hair.

Relying on its physical body alone, it could already go toe-to-toe with late-stage Foundation Establishment demon beasts.

It had long unlocked a psychic connection with Xu Ke, but Li Fan had always ignored him.

As a result, Xu Ke, naive as he was, never noticed.

On the contrary, Li Fan took the opportunity to constantly probe Xu Ke's mind, trying to extract the foundational technique of the Beast Taming Sect, the Beast Taming Art.

Unfortunately, the kid's thoughts were too erratic, like a wild horse, impossible to pin down.

Moreover, the Beast Taming Art seemed to have some sort of restriction preventing spirit beasts from prying, so Li Fan had never succeeded.

One day, as Li Fan lay in Xu Ke's hair sunbathing and dozing off, he suddenly felt a sense of foreboding. He stood up, his expression solemn.

"Judging by the time, today should be the day Mr. Bai appears."

To avoid drawing attention, Li Fan quickly shrank back and hid inside, secretly observing.

Half a day later, with a resounding dragon's roar echoing through the heavens and earth, Mr. Bai made his official entrance.

Just as in his past life, the entire Beast Taming Sect found no one who could stand against Mr. Bai.

Sky-Soaring Azure Dragons, Twin-Winged White Tigers, Two-Horned Qilins...

Many exotic beasts were slain, their organs taken by Mr. Bai as "gifts for the children."

Painful wails echoed throughout the Beast Taming Sect.

The disciples of the Beast Taming Sect stood in stunned silence, trembling with fear.

At that moment, Li Fan moved.

Suppressing his inner terror, he transformed into a streak of black light and shot toward the sky through the rain of blood from the demon beasts.

Indeed, Li Fan's target was Mr. Bai!

He had long harbored a suspicion in his heart.

Could this Mr. Bai of the Fallen Immortal Realm be the Heavenly Doctor from many years later in the real world?

There were just too many similarities between the two.

Both were experts in medicine, both had unfathomable strength, and both had methods that were hard to distinguish as either righteous or evil.

During the Retrieve the Longevity Fruit From NingYuan” incident, Li Fan had never managed to see Mr. Bai's true face.

And now, in this Change in the Beast Taming Sect, due to some unknown influence, Li Fan, looking up from below, still couldn't see his appearance clearly.

Thus, Li Fan made this attempt.

He wanted to get close to Mr. Bai and find out the truth!

To be honest, with his current cultivation level, barely at the Foundation Establishment stage, it was sheer madness to think he could achieve this without external help.

However, Li Fan had some confidence.

This confidence came from Xu Ke.

Xu Ke was a person favored by destiny, and as his companion spirit beast, Li Fan was also blessed with fortune.

More importantly, Xu Ke was one of the "children" Mr. Bai had referred to!

With this connection, Li Fan believed that if Mr. Bai's current demeanor was not a façade, then he wouldn't be in any real danger.

Besides, this was within the Fallen Immortal Realm.

Even if he perished, it would only be his consciousness that would suffer damage.

It was worth the risk.

As the Beast Taming Sect crumbled, the black light that Li Fan had transformed into was strikingly conspicuous.

Like a reverse-flying meteor, it was unstoppable and filled with determination.

"Who is that?"

"how dare it?"

These questions surged through the minds of all the Beast Taming Sect members.

Even the powerful exotic beasts, whose strength rivaled Soul Transformation cultivators, were defeated by the invaders. Where did this black bird, seemingly only at the Foundation Establishment level, find the courage?

Amidst the shock and confusion, Li Fan ascended rapidly, closing in on the figure in the sky.

"Hmm?"

Mr. Bai glanced over.

In an instant, Li Fan felt the space around him, and even his thoughts, freeze.

He was plunged into absolute stillness.

He didn't know how much time had passed, or if it was just a moment later.

The confinement around him suddenly vanished, and Li Fan regained the ability to move.

"So this is the power of a top-notch expert..."

Li Fan was horrified.

He finally understood why those who had slain Crimson Flame and successfully achieved Dao integration in the past looked foolish and as if they were waiting to die when facing Ink Death.

It wasn't that they didn't want to resist or flee.

They simply couldn't!

The only reason Li Fan was able to break free from Mr. Bai's grip was not due to his own power.

It was because of a faint shout from below—Xu Ke's voice.

"Little Black!"

Li Fan believed that everything within the Beast Taming Sect couldn't escape Mr. Bai's notice.

With Xu Ke's shout, Mr. Bai naturally noticed the connection between the bird Li Fan had possessed and Xu Ke.

So, Mr. Bai didn't harm Li Fan and even allowed the daring bird to approach him.

At such close range, Li Fan finally saw Mr. Bai's appearance clearly.

Even with the experience of a hundred lifetimes, Li Fan couldn't help but be stunned.

He finally understood why, back in Ningyuan City, people had said that Mr. Bai was extraordinarily good-looking.

He exuded a slightly frail aura, but his face seemed flawless, breathtakingly beautiful.

It was as if all the love of the heavens and earth had been bestowed upon him. Li Fan's mind was filled with thoughts like, "How could someone be this good-looking?" and "It's a pity he's not a woman."

Mr. Bai looked at the bird, standing dumbfounded in the air, and smiled slightly.

At that moment, Li Fan felt as if the sky, which had been shrouded in dark clouds, suddenly cleared up.

Mr. Bai glanced at Li Fan and shook his head slightly, "You silly child, why are you practicing recklessly?"

With a gentle wave of his finger, Li Fan felt a torrent of information flood into his mind.

This is...

Li Fan was stunned.

Then, his heart began to race uncontrollably.

It was all the secrets of life and the various paths to evolution and transcendence...

It was the perfected version of his cultivation technique, the Creation Furnace Technique!

Chapter 452: The Marvelous Skill and True Transformation

"Cloud and Water Illusion Dream Art," "Mystic True Spirit Transformation," "Stealing the Sky and changing the Sun Technique"...

Li Fan had once practiced these techniques, which could be considered peerless and extraordinary.

But compared to the "Creation Furnace Technique" he just obtained in his mind, all of them paled in comparison and were hardly worth mentioning.

Li Fan was deeply immersed in the beautiful words, as if he could glimpse the true mysteries of the universe through this technique.

He even had a premonition that in this era where there are no restrictions on cultivation, this single technique could allow even someone without any cultivation potential to refine, evolve, and transcend themselves step by step, eventually becoming extraordinary and ascending to immortality!

What is called the supreme profound skill? What is the ultimate orthodox method?

This is it!

It truly deserves the term "Creation."

Li Fan eagerly read and comprehended the "Creation Furnace Technique," unable to suppress his joy.

"To hear the Dao in the morning, and die in the evening without regret!"

His mind was completely immersed, not even realizing when he returned to Xu Ke's side.

He didn't know how long it had been when he finally came to his senses, and Mr. Bai had already disappeared without a trace.

The Beast Taming Sect had become chaotic, just like in his previous life. The disciples of the Beast Taming Sect, who witnessed their elders being slaughtered wantonly, were filled with despair.

At this moment, Xu Ke was cautiously leading Li Fan, trying to avoid the crazed actions of his senior brothers, attempting to follow the guidance of the jade talisman given by Lu Ya to find Mr. Bai.

Peering into Xu Ke's thoughts, Li Fan was surprised to find that Xu Ke's memory completely lacked the scene of him transforming into a mystical bird, flying to Mr. Bai's side, and receiving his guidance.

After a moment of thought, Li Fan immediately understood.

"A person without guilt may incur guilt by possessing a treasure."

The "Creation Furnace Technique" passed down by Mr. Bai could be considered the ultimate miraculous method. If it were to fall into the hands of a mere Foundation Establishment-level demon beast, it would undoubtedly arouse the covetousness of others.

No matter how mystical the technique, it would be useless if he couldn't practice it. Mr. Bai must have considered this, so he erased the memories of everyone present. In this way, Li Fan wouldn't face danger because of this technique and would have enough time to practice it slowly.

"Mr. Bai was very thoughtful!"Li Fan couldn't help but sigh.

After seeing Mr. Bai in person, Li Fan was now certain that he was definitely not [Heavenly Doctor].

Not only did they not resemble each other in appearance, but their temperaments were also vastly different.

Mr. Bai's beauty was unforgettable after just one glance. Most importantly, the kindness and warmth he unconsciously exuded were impossible to fake. It was completely different from the eerie and unpredictable nature of the [Heavenly Doctor].

Li Fan couldn't help but breathe a sigh of relief.

"To deal with the myriad demon beasts as easily as slaughtering chickens and dogs; with just one glance, he could see through my cultivation method and instantly provide the ultimate solution; effortlessly altering the consciousness of all the living beings present—such power could be said to rival creation itself."

"Mr. Bai's strength..."Combined with his actions, Li Fan couldn't help but think of the words [Longevity Heavenly Sovereign].

"In the understanding of the children in Ningyuan City, Mr. Bai is just a mortal. Mr. Bai himself also admitted this."

"In a short time, a mortal into a God, then from a god to immortal."

"Looking at it this way, the claims of the orphans in Ningyuan City that Mr. Bai is the kindest person in the world, the best healer, the most beautiful person, the gentlest speaker, the smartest person, and so on, may not be exaggerated at all."

Li Fan's heart couldn't help but waver.

But a question soon followed.

Where is Mr. Bai now, thousands of years later?

Is he one of the other two of the Five Elders Association besides [Unified Mind-heart], [Worry-Free], and [True Reality]?

Li Fan thought it was unlikely. The way the Five Elders Association conducts itself is completely at odds with Mr. Bai.

Is he in the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance?

The Eastern Extremity Heavenly Sovereign, who is said to have created the [Pure Body Spirit Pool Formation] and helped mortals expel miasma from their bodies, does bear some resemblance to Mr. Bai. However, this Eastern Extremity Heavenly Sovereign has only appeared in rumors. Even Li Fan only came across a mention of him while reading ancient texts.

Most Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance cultivators probably aren't even aware of his existence.

If Mr. Bai were still alive, he certainly wouldn't be so unknown.

Or, like the Dao Transmission Heavenly Sovereign in the previous life, did Mr. Bai successfully break free from the constraints of the Xuanhuang World and leave this realm?

Or...

Has Mr. Bai already perished?

Just thinking about it, Li Fan shook his head and dismissed this idea.

He found it hard to believe that someone as astonishingly talented as Mr. Bai would fall so easily.

Li Fan stayed hidden in Xu Ke's hair, his thoughts churning, while naturally operating the "Creation Furnace Technique."

Unlike the method Li Fan had previously devised himself, which involved brute force bombardment of his internal reserves and then seizing the overflow of reserve power for cultivation, the "Creation Furnace Technique" refined by Mr. Bai used the Heavenly and Human Induction technique to resonate with the universe's great furnace and the human body's internal furnace.

Under the unity of Heaven and Man, one could freely manipulate the reserve power for transformation and cultivation.

It also promoted the evolution of the body's internal furnace towards the universe's great furnace, truly a wondrous and profound method.

With each moment of cultivation, Li Fan felt the mystical bird he was possessing undergoing transformation.

What jolted him from this indescribably marvelous cultivation process, of course, was none other than that loathsome Beast Taming Sect disciple, Song Yang.

He still harbored evil intentions towards Li Fan, the [Heavenly Fate Mystical Bird].

After failing in his previous attempt, this time he returned with even greater force, having spent a fortune to borrow a Golden core stage Ink Immortal Tiger for assistance, swearing to capture Li Fan.

The Ink Immortal Tiger roared and strutted arrogantly, while Li Fan, who had been disturbed, was extremely displeased.

The furnace in his body roared, and the reserve power surged out.

Li Fan flew into the sky, his body expanding, and in an instant, he transformed from a small bird the size of a palm into a fierce beast with a wingspan of three zhang, two or three times larger than the Ink Immortal Tiger.

Like catching a chick, Li Fan grabbed the Ink Immortal Tiger with one claw.

Before it could struggle, a dark profound light emitted from Li Fan's mouth, giving birth to a suction force, and Li Fan swallowed the Ink Immortal Tiger in one gulp.

Xu Ke was instantly dumbfounded.

As for Song Yang, he was terrified out of his wits, fleeing in panic.

There was still a faint stench lingering in the air.

Li Fan snorted coldly, disdainful of pursuing.

He withdrew his reserve power, returning to his original size, and landed back on Xu Ke's head.

The forced transformation seemed to have drained some of his strength, but his body, like a furnace, refined the Ink Immortal Tiger he had swallowed into pure energy.

Warm currents coursed through his entire body, and Li Fan suddenly felt a wave of fatigue.

He then uncontrollably fell into a deep sleep.

Leaving Xu Ke with a face full of disbelief, he stretched out his hands, touched Li Fan, and stood there like a wooden statue.

Chapter 453: The Thousand-Year Illusion-Breaking Stone Eye

In the Tianxuan Mirror.

Li Fan sat in a daze, his expression vacant.

Even though he had long known that the items and knowledge obtained in the Fallen Immortal Realm could only be brought back if one resolved their desires, it was still hard to accept.

This time, when he returned to the real world and couldn’t recall a single word of the "Creation Furnace Technique" taught by Mr. Bai, Li Fan found it difficult to maintain his composure.

Having experienced the wonders of such supreme Daoist methods firsthand, Li Fan found his own crude techniques even more unacceptable.

The gap was too vast, like the difference between the stars in the sky and the plants on the ground.

The stark contrast left Li Fan feeling a bit unbalanced.

Especially since the treasure he once possessed vanished like smoke in an instant, never to be seen again.

Even someone as mentally resilient as Li Fan couldn't help but feel a sense of loss.

"Mr. Bai, the Creation Furnace Technique..."

"If I can try endlessly, surely one day I can bring this true skill back."

After a long while, Li Fan took a deep breath and slowly suppressed the negative emotions in his heart.

Based on his experience in "Retrieve the Ningyuan’s Longevity Fruit," to bring an item out, one must fulfill the lingering wish of the item's owner.

What could Mr. Bai's lingering wish be?

For now, Mr. Bai was still too mysterious for Li Fan. He could only keep trying slowly in the future.

After a brief moment of sensing, Li Fan realized that the next time he could enter the Fallen Immortal Realm would be in half a year.

Unfortunately, this time limit was a bit longer than usual, so Li Fan sighed and kept it in mind.

At this time, Li Fan checked his communication talisman and discovered a message from Chen Ying.

Chen Ying mentioned that he had already headed to the destination and was fully prepared.

If he managed to survive this ordeal, he promised to repay Li Fan generously.

Li Fan chuckled and thought that if this were true, he could use it as a typical case to widely promote.

"But the major battle in Tianling Prefecture is not set to occur until 16 years later. The focus before that should be on the Lingwu Grass incident."

"If it weren't for the clear declaration from the Tianxuan Mirror, the Five Elders Association wouldn't make a big fuss over an unknown cave."

"And without Jiao Xiuyuan's instigation, the Lingwu Grass incident wouldn't have spread as far as it did in the previous life."

After careful consideration, Li Fan decided to visit Jiao Xiuyuan first.

Without concealing his identity, Li Fan, in the appearance of a disciple of the Heavenly Mechanism Sect, arrived outside Qianli Hall.

Inside, it was as quiet as ever.

Jiao Xiuyuan was lazily lying on a long bench, eyes half-closed, seemingly dozing off.

Hearing footsteps, he suddenly stood up and changed his expression.

"Oh, a guest is here!"

Jiao Xiuyuan looked at Li Fan, first stunned, then greeted him warmly without showing any emotion.

Li Fan didn't mention what he was there to buy, but instead, he narrowed his eyes and stared at Jiao Xiuyuan.

The two stared at each other in silence for a while.

After a moment, Li Fan was the first to cup his hands in greeting: "Your puppet technique, transforming into thousands forms, is indeed extraordinary!"

"Even in ancient times, it would have been considered a rare divine ability!"

Surprised to have his secret technique revealed by someone he just met, Jiao Xiuyuan was taken aback.

But he covered it up well and immediately responded, "Peering into the mysteries of heaven and probing karma. The ancient Hevanely Mechanism Sect truly lives up to its name!"

"Impressive! Truly impressive!"

"I've long heard of you! I've long heard of you!"

The two exchanged a glance and laughed heartily.

After some mutual compliments\itumd and formal introductions, Jiao Xiuyuan tentatively asked, "You didn't just come here to tease me, did you?"

"Why would I be so idle?" Li Fan waved his hand. "I’m here for the sake of 'wealth.'"

Jiao Xiuyuan's interest was piqued: "Oh? What are you looking for? Formation talismans, magical artifacts, pills—we have it all, and in large quantities..." he said casually.

"Do I look like I'm lacking in those?" Li Fan asked with a smile.

"Then what do you want?" Jiao Xiuyuan's face became serious.

"I didn’t come to buy but to sell!" Li Fan shook his head and said seriously. "As for whether the deal can be made, it depends on whether you recognize its value."

"Sell? Not everything can be accepted here..." Jiao Xiuyuan began, but stopped when he saw what was in Li Fan's hand.

An eyeball, looking as if it were alive, glared at him fiercely.

It exuded killing intent, making him instinctively want to defend himself.

Fortunately, he noticed that the eyeball had no offensive power and managed to hold back.

"What is this?" Jiao Xiuyuan squinted his eyes and couldn't help but ask.

Li Fan, with a hint of nostalgia in his voice, said, "This is a relic of my late senior brother. He has passed, and this item is now useless to me. It only brings sadness when I see it. So, I want to pass it on to someone else who is fated. Unfortunately, the Tianxuan Mirror didn't recognize its value and offered a low price. It's an insult to my senior brother."

"So I deduced the heavenly secrets and searched for someone qualified to take it. That's how I ended up here with you," Li Fan explained slowly.

Li Fan wasn't lying.

In the Tianji Sect ruins in Baishi Cave Heaven, besides techniques and scriptures, Li Fan had two other gains.

One of them was the eyeball in his hand.

The Tianxuan Mirror identified it as the *"Illusion-Breaking Stone Eye,"* a kind of unique existence that gathers the rules of heaven and earth.

It is said that if a cultivator absorbs and refines it, they will gain the ability to see through illusions and foresee the future.

In theory, such a treasure should be incredibly valuable.

But unfortunately, this "Illusion-Breaking Stone Eye" had already been refined once by a cultivator.

The pure laws of heaven and earth had been tainted by the cultivator's aura and karma.

Moreover, thousands of years had passed, the world had undergone great changes, and the laws of heaven had significantly altered from ancient times.

Due to these two factors, the Illusion-Breaking Stone Eye's divination ability was greatly diminished.

If it worked once out of ten times, one could count themselves lucky.

Therefore, the Tianxuan Mirror offered a recovery price of only 60,000 contribution points.

Although this item was of little use to Li Fan, who could already foresee the future, he wasn't lacking those 60,000 points, so he kept it with him.

Now, it was the perfect time to use it to establish a connection with Jiao Xiuyuan.

"So, Friend Jiao, do you recognize this item?" Li Fan deliberately asked.

Jiao Xiuyuan was stunned for a moment, then sneered, "How could I not know? It's just the Eye of Truth."

He pondered for a moment and said, "To be honest, the low price given by the Tianxuan Mirror has its reasons."

"Although this item is rare, if you want to sell it at a good price, you’ll need to find the right buyer."

Li Fan responded, "I understand that, of course. That's why I came to you."

Li Fan casually tossed the Illusion-Breaking Stone Eye to Jiao Xiuyuan and said, "I trust you can find it a suitable new owner."

"Please do me this favor. Half of the proceeds will go to you. How about it?"

Jiao Xiuyuan's eyes lit up: "I’ll take this deal!"

Chapter 454: The Mysterious Art Swallows the Earth’s Veins

Seeing that Jiao Xiuyuan agreed so readily, Li Fan nodded, “Then, I’ll leave this matter to you, Daoist Jiao. I look forward to your good news!”

After saying that, he threw a communication talisman to Jiao Xiuyuan and left without mentioning anything about leaving a receipt.

"This person really trusts me," Jiao Xiuyuan muttered to himself as he tossed the Illusion-breaking Stone Eye in his hand.

In the next moment, the Stone Eye vanished into thin air, its destination unknown.

The puppet on ten thousand immortal Island returned to its previous lazy state.

Jiao Xiuyuan never imagined that it wasn't trust Li Fan had in him, but rather that the Illusion-Breaking Stone Eye was merely a pretext for Li Fan to establish a connection with him. Even if Jiao Xiuyuan couldn’t sell it or decided to keep it for himself, it wouldn't matter to Li Fan. What Li Fan truly cared about was the "big business" that was coming next.

Back in the Tianxuan Mirror, Li Fan recalled the other object he had discovered in the Heavenly Mechanism Sect ruins.

It was an entire layer of a pagoda that he had cut out and brought back.

His intuition at the time had been correct.

According to the Tianxuan Mirror’s assessment, the entire layer of the stone pagoda was actually a magical artifact called the *[Heaven and Earth Divination Dice]*.

When mortals roll dice, they get numbers like five or six.

But when cultivators roll the dice, they get the number of the celestial mystery.

The ancient cultivators of the Heveanly Mechanism Sect used these Heaven and Earth Divination Dice, relying on sufficient information and using qi sensing as a driving force, to deduce countless possibilities of the future.

The reason why Li Fan saw only an empty void was that the Heaven and Earth Divination Dice were frozen in the scene where the deduction was completed.

“A void.”

“I wonder what the Heavenly Mechanism Sect cultivators were deducing back then to arrive at such a result.”

Li Fan stretched out his hand, and a crystal-clear icosahedral dice appeared in his palm.

If you looked closely, it seemed that each side flickered with a different image.

Although Li Fan had tried several times before to use these *Heaven and Earth Divination Dice* to deduce the future, to see if it aligned with his previous experiences, he only obtained fragmented and meaningless images, probably due to improper usage. These images were of no practical use.

Even so, Li Fan didn’t sell it. He had a gut feeling that keeping it might be of great use in the future.

After playing with it for a while, Li Fan put away the Dice and shifted his focus to his clone, "Zhou Qingang."

These days, he had been staying on Taian Island, only occasionally using a communication talisman to contact necessary people.

He wasn't just idly daydreaming but was researching how to overcome the side effects of the *[Heaven-Devouring Earth-Eating Technique]*.

This secret technique was likely inspired by the ancient mythical beast, the Guiyuan Toad. Although it truly had the ability to devour the world, the mind was easily lost, and the end result was either death from overconsumption or being discovered and beaten to death.

However, Li Fan possessed the power to maintain absolute rationality, the *Blue Flame* from the visualization of the Illusory Spirit.

He didn’t seek to stay calm during the entire devouring process, only to stop at critical moments.

With the dual boost from the *Enlightenment Pill* and the *Spiritual Awakening State*, Li Fan finally managed to achieve this after much effort.

However, to increase his cultivation using the *Heaven-Devouring Earth-Eating Technique*, he still needed to solve the problem of the earth's veins solidifying and becoming unabsorbable.

Li Fan had already planned for this.

Concealing his presence, he teleported to the western part of Lingmu Island in the Congyun Sea and continued flying westward.

After about five hundred miles, Li Fan quietly dove into the sea.

He searched the seabed for a while and indeed found the remnants of a sunken island.

In his previous life, not long from now, this island would re-emerge from the sea due to a mysterious change in the earth’s veins.

The reactivation of the island’s protective formation would also attract the attention of the formation masters in the Congyun Sea’s Formation Hall.

However, before all that happened, this place looked no different from the other ruins scattered across the seabed.

Li Fan entered the ruins and patiently waited.

Seven days later, the seabed began to tremble slightly.

“It’s here!”

Li Fan thought to himself, and with a swift kick, he sunk into the ground.

At the same time, he activated the *Heaven-Devouring Earth-Eating Technique* and began to sense his surroundings.

From an unknown, far-off place, a continuous surge of power slowly activated the dried-up earth vein node here.

If left unchecked, this reactivated node would push the sunken island back to the surface.

But with Li Fan here, that wouldn’t happen.

Under his feet, it was as if a giant vortex had formed.

The surging power of the earth's veins, before taking shape, was entirely absorbed into Li Fan’s body, transforming into pure spiritual energy.

Simultaneously, the technique practiced by his clone started to operate rapidly.

It wasn't the technique originally practiced by the spy Zhou Qingang.

Instead, it was the *[Heavenly Fate Xuanji Technique]*, a Nascent Soul technique from the Hevenly Mechanism Sect.

This ancient technique was known for being extremely slow to cultivate. But now, with the unrestricted acceleration provided by the *Heaven-Devouring Earth-Eating Technique*, it was progressing at a frightening speed.

The power of the earth's veins flowed endlessly, and Li Fan's clone absorbed it without restraint.

What should have been a phenomenon that shook the entire surrounding sea was quietly neutralized.

In just an instant, the clone's cultivation reached the peak of the early Golden Core stage.

Due to the existence of *Heavenly Calamity*, no matter how fast the *Heavenly Fate Xuanji Technique* operated, his cultivation could not advance any further.

Li Fan frowned slightly but did not stop devouring.

Even though the power of the earth’s veins he was devouring was being wasted, he didn’t mind at all.

The spiritual energy transformed by the *Heaven-Devouring Earth-Eating Technique* continued to accumulate in the clone’s body, completely filling every part of it.

As the clone’s body was about to burst, Li Fan patted his chest, and his hand emitted a powerful suction force.

He began to absorb and transform the excess spiritual energy within his body.

In the ancient times before the "Heavenly Calamity", such a situation wouldn’t have occurred, as the speed of obtaining spiritual energy would never outpace the growth of cultivation.

But the existence of cultivation bottlenecks trapped Li Fan in this strange predicament.

The energy from devouring was all used to accelerate the cultivation technique.

Yet, no progress could be made.

The technique operated at a terrifying speed, like a turbulent tide crashing against an indestructible dam again and again.

Li Fan carefully observed and recorded everything happening within his body.

Compared to the immense power of the earth's veins, the strength of a small Golden Core cultivator was insignificant.

But this force, which should have at least advanced a Golden Core cultivator to the Nascent Soul stage, was being continually consumed in the process of overcoming the Heavenly Calamity.

However, it turned out that Li Fan’s efforts were not in vain.

After countless impacts, the bottleneck finally showed a sign slight loosening.

Chapter 455: The Heavenly Palm Lightly Sweeps

Li Fan’s eyes flashed with a glimmer as he increased the intensity of his devouring.

The earth vein energy, which had traveled millions of miles to reach him, completely flowed into Li Fan's body.

"Boom!"

"Boom!"

Li Fan seemed to faintly hear the sound of collisions and roaring explosions coming from within his body.

In the midst of this internal struggle, it felt as if something was slowly shattering.

A crisp cracking sound seemed to echo in his ears.

Moments later, Li Fan's cultivation surged forward, with his aura constantly rising. In the blink of an eye, he advanced from just recently breaking through the mid-stage of the Golden Core to rapidly moving toward the late stage.

At this moment...

Li Fan suddenly sensed that the dim light at the bottom of the sea had completely disappeared.

It wasn't just darkness in his vision, but a suffocating feeling of space being sealed.

Without pausing his devouring technique, Li Fan simultaneously looked up.

He saw a gigantic palm above his head, its origin unknown.

It obscured everything and pressed down on him.

Before this immense palm, Li Fan was as insignificant as an ant.

"Damn!"

Seeing this powerful being appear out of nowhere, Li Fan cursed inwardly.

However, his clone was currently operating the "Heaven-Devouring Earth-Eating Technique," making him fearless, as if he had the courage of a bear or leopard. Faced with this terrifying giant palm, he was not afraid at all.

On the contrary, he opened his mouth, wanting to devour the giant palm as well!

And the result...

Naturally, it was predictable.

In the next moment, Li Fan lost contact with his clone.

The only fortunate thing was that this mysterious being did not seem intent on pursuing the matter further.

They didn't follow the trail to find Li Fan's true body.

Otherwise, he would have been forced to reveal himself again.

Li Fan carefully recalled the timing of the giant hand’s appearance.

"It seems that it was triggered because I forcefully broke through the Heavenly Calamity?"

"Is it a countermeasure from the heavens, or..."

Frowning slightly, a blue light emitted from the Dao Deviation Stone crystal in Li Fan's mind.

Just before his clone was crushed, using the "Heaven-Devouring Earth-Eating Technique," he managed to absorb a trace of energy from that giant hand.

If the opponent had been a cultivator, Li Fan would not have been able to do this at all.

As he repeatedly savored the taste of that energy, Li Fan began to ponder.

"It feels more like a pure force of rules."

"It seems somewhat similar to Senior Brother Zhang's Grand Aspiration Dharma Body."

"Normally, he doesn't show up in public, but he will take action under certain circumstances..."

"I had originally planned to use the 'Heaven-Devouring Earth-Eating Method' to elevate the clone's cultivation to the peak of the Golden Core stage first, to accumulate experience for breaking through to the Nascent Soul. Who would have thought that such a calamity could occur?"

"Fortunately, it was just a clone."

Li Fan sighed, having grown accustomed to the constant dangers of the Xuanhuang Realm.

Quietly leaving Ten Thousand Immortal Island, he found a secluded spot and spent some time recreating the "Zhou Qingang" clone.

The clone nodded slightly, bid farewell to the true body, and headed toward the site of the incident.

He wanted to see what had become of the sea area after being struck by that heavenly palm.

Soon, Li Fan returned to the scene.

To his great surprise, the sea was calm, the sky clear.

There was no sign of any calamity.

It seemed as though everything that had happened earlier was just an illusion.

Li Fan pondered for a moment before diving into the sea.

When he saw the scene at the bottom, his pupils constricted.

The ruins of the sunken island were gone.

In their place was an ordinary seabed of mud and sand.

It wasn’t just destroyed; it was as if every trace of its existence had been completely erased!

After a long, deep look, Zhou Qingang quietly returned to Taian Island and laid low.

In the Tianxuan Mirror.

Through the eyes of his clone, Li Fan observed the aftermath of the giant palm strike and fell into contemplation.

"Because I forcefully broke through the Heavenly Calamity, did I trigger some kind of taboo, resulting in an attempt to erase me?"

"And it all happened so silently."

"If one could survive such a strike, what would happen?"

"Would there be no more bottlenecks? Of course, it might also attract even more terrifying existence."

These reckless thoughts lasted only a moment before Li Fan dismissed them.

"However, in my previous life, after some time, the Heavenly Calamity would mysteriously disappear on its own. I wonder what the reason behind that is."

After being suppressed by the sudden appearance of the giant palm, Li Fan abandoned the idea of having his clone cultivate as well.

He decided it was better to use the clone as a mere tool, to sacrifice itself in critical moments.

Since his attempt to gain early insights into forming the Nascent Soul through his clone had failed, Li Fan had no choice but to take a step back and purchase related experiences from the Tianxuan Mirror.

Each person's insights varied greatly, yet all had their merits, with no clear distinctions of superiority.

With his abundant resources, Li Fan bought everything and studied them carefully.

Time passed slowly as Li Fan continued his cultivation and contemplation.

Soon, it was time for his second investment meeting with He Zhenghao.

Since the previous meeting had gone well, He Zhenghao had made some decent gains this time, raising a total of 550,000 contribution points.

After confirming with Li Fan, He Zhenghao immediately transferred the contribution points over.

He also added his own 100,000 contribution points.

"One year later, one million contribution points," Li Fan stated concisely.

He Zhenghao was overjoyed, and a stream of flattery spilled from his lips.

Li Fan couldn't be bothered to listen and directly cut off communication.

He then began reviewing the list of contributors this time.

What caught his attention was that a cultivator named Zhou Peng still held the largest share.

"Interesting. He has such confidence in me? Not afraid that I’ll take the money and run?"

"And how does a Foundation Establishment cultivator like him, just like He Zhenghao, have so many contribution points?"

Li Fan had heard of this person from He Zhenghao in his past life.

He was a friend who often gathered with He Zhenghao to discuss investment strategies.

It seemed he had a close relationship with a certain cultivator from Tianji Hall, making him well-informed, often leading others to small profits.

Thus, he held considerable influence within their small circle.

In past lives, when He Zhenghao planned to speculate on Lingwu(Spirit Mist) Grass, this person had played a significant role.

"Hmph, whatever the scheme, I'm not afraid. Let's just watch and see."

Li Fan looked at his balance of over six million contribution points and sneered.

With so many contribution points, he could keep up the charade for a while longer.

Besides, the Lingwu Grass incident was approaching.

These contribution points would multiply several times over.

"The only concern is that such a large transaction might attract the attention of those with ulterior motives."

"It's time to check on how Junior Brother Tianyang is recovering."

With this in mind, Li Fan quietly entered the Dao Formation.

Tianyang sat quietly within the formation, absorbing energy to restore himself.

He made no defensive moves against Li Fan's arrival.

Li Fan checked on the progress.

"Almost there."

"A Nascent Soul-level strength should be safe within the Congyun Sea."

"But outside the Congyun Sea, it might not be enough."

"Crimson Flames burning the sea..."

Li Fan glanced at Tianyang, a trace of hesitation flashing in his eyes.

Chapter 456: Frustrations and Trivial Matters

Based on Li Fan's experiences from his previous lives, in the Crimson Flame Sea Incineration incident, any cultivator who attempted to merge with the Crimson Flame ultimately met with death.

Ink death, who had inherited the Heaven's Mandate to destroy the world, was simply too terrifying.

A newly merged cultivator stood no chance against Him.

"Junior Brother Tianyang's actual combat power is likely even lower than Zhang Zhiliang's in the previous life, so I won't let him go to his death."

"A puppet body is different from a mortal one. To improve combat strength, breaking through cultivation levels isn't the only way."

"Although costly, once the Cloud Sea is destroyed and I flee with the money, it'll definitely be enough for me."

After some thought, Li Fan ultimately abandoned the plan to have Tianyang risk merging and instead focused on observing and protecting him.

Fifteen days later.

As the materials within the *Return to Origin Formation* were completely exhausted, Tianyang also completed his final transformation.

His puppet body was perfectly reinforced, and his cultivation level stabilized at the peak of the Soul Transformation stage.

"Junior Brother Tianyang relies almost entirely on brute strength in battle. He still needs to find ways to refine it."

With his cultivation complete and nothing to do, Tianyang stood silently and followed behind Li Fan.

Li Fan took out the prepared clothing from his storage ring and dressed Tianyang.

At the same time, he taught him the secret technique *Sky-Shrouding Palm*.

"Junior Brother, from now on, you'll study this secret technique. Once you master it, you can follow me in action," Li Fan instructed.

Tianyang nodded solemnly and began studying earnestly.

With only a trace of instinct left, the secret techniques of the Heavenly Mechanism Sect were still somewhat complex for Tianyang. Fortunately, with Li Fan's careful guidance and Tianyang's focused mind, he would eventually master it through gradual study.

[TL: Lingwu Island and Lingwu Grass will now be translated as Spirit Mist Island and Spirit Mist Grass]

As Tianyang diligently improved himself under Li Fan's guidance, Li Fan shifted his attention to *Spirit Mist Island*.

He made a brief visit to Spirit Mist Island and silently locked down the island's defenses with a formless killing intent.

Then, he returned to the Tianxuan Mirror and began quietly acquiring Spirit Mist Grass while patiently waiting.

Soon, the day arrived when the Dragon Whale Beast was supposed to attack Spirit Mist Island, as it had in the previous life.

However, for some unknown reason, the dragon whale had yet to appear by sunset.

A sense of unease gripped Li Fan.

As he feared, three more days passed, and Spirit Mist Island remained unscathed.

Li Fan finally realized that the variables brought by his arrival nearly a year earlier in this world were inevitable.

Instead of acting rashly, Li Fan first carefully investigated the whereabouts of the missing dragon whale beast.

A creature with strength comparable to a Foundation Establishment cultivator, one that had vaguely developed its own intelligence and could grow stronger by continuously devouring, shouldn't have just vanished without a trace.

After searching for half a day with no results, Li Fan resorted to posting an anonymous bounty task, which finally yielded the answer.

It turned out that the dragon whale beast had been killed not long ago by a Golden Core weapon refiner named "Yue Zaisen".

All the valuable materials from the beast's body had been taken by him.

Yue Zaisen even sent a message, offering to sell any parts Li Fan might need at a low price.

Feigning interest, Li Fan purchased several pieces of whale bone.

After the transaction, Li Fan engaged in some casual conversation with Yue Zaisen, trying to uncover the reason for this deviation from previous lifetimes.

Yue Zaisen, not suspecting anything, revealed that he had been temporarily inspired to search for materials in the Congyun sea at the request of his friend, Mu Rong, who wanted to forge a High quality defensive artifact.

As for why Mu Rong, who was perfectly fine, suddenly wanted a defensive artifact, Yue Zaisen hadn't asked.

"Mu Rong…" Li Fan ended the communication, his expression shifting.

This name was not unfamiliar to him.

He even had some interactions with Mu Rong.

This person was Chen Ying's assistant. In the previous life, before Chen Ying went to the Five Elements Cave Heaven, he had left Li Fan with Mu Rong's contact information.

he told Li Fan that if he had any problems, he could directly seek out Mu Rong.

"Could it be that after seeing Chen Ying purchase so many life-saving treasures, he too developed a sense of crisis? Is that why he did this?"

"Or perhaps Chen Ying said something to him…"

Li Fan felt a wave of helplessness.

In any case, with the dragon whale not attacking Spirit Mist Island, Li Fan realized that he would have to personally intervene to set history back on its intended course.

"The risk is not small, and I need to do it without leaving any traces." Li Fan didn't act hastily but instead began to carefully plan in his mind.

"Should I disguise myself as a beast to act? Or should I borrow the power of the Five Elders Association?"

"The chances of exposure are high in both scenarios."

"Perhaps I don't necessarily have to insist on the Spirit Mist Grass. As long as I meet the conditions of stable demand and plants that only grow in certain special regions, it should suffice."

"Let's see if there's anything similar."

Li Fan had a sudden thought and began searching through the Tianxuan Mirror.

There were indeed many targets that met the criteria, but after adding further restrictions, specifically looking for those with unusual recent price fluctuations, only a few remained.

Li Fan carefully examined each one, finally setting his sights on a spiritual plant known as *Samantabhadra True Leaf*.

This herb had a relatively long growth cycle and wasn't commonly used.

Its primary use was in the creation of a talisman known as *Wise Discernment*.

In the era before the Tianxuan Spirit Locking Formation was invented, the Five Elders Association's spies were pervasive.

Most of them, like Zhou Qing'ang, mastered secret art of shape-shifting techniques that could even deceive the White Jade Inquiry Platform.

When the Wise Discernment Talisman was first invented hundreds of years ago, it played a significant role in rooting out many Five Elders Association spies.

Because of this, it became an unwritten rule that entry into certain classified areas of the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance required verification by the Wise Discernment Talisman.

Although the Five Elders Association later learned from their mistakes and improved the concealment techniques of their spies, rendering the Wise Discernment Talisman largely ineffective, its use had become a habit.

The Five Elders Association, naturally, couldn't openly announce that the Wise Discernment Talisman was no longer effective.

And no one in the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance had made a decision to stop using the Wise Discernment Talisman.

Moreover, an interest chain had formed behind the production and manufacturing of the Wise Discernment Talisman.

Due to these various factors, the Ten Thousand Immortals Alliance continued to require a significant amount of Samantabhadra True Leaf each year.

But for some unknown reason, the once stable price of Samantabhadra True Leaf had recently begun to decline abnormally.

Li Fan frowned slightly.

He recalled that in his previous life, as the price of Spirit Mist Grass skyrocketed, it also drove up the prices of other spiritual plants and herbs in the market.

Samantabhadra True Leaf, however, was an exception.

Chapter 457: The Hidden Scheme of the Samantabhadra True Leaf

The price of the Samantabhadra True Leaf has always been quite stable.

There was even a rare occurrence where its price fell despite market trends.

Even when the Spirit Mist Grass caused a market crash in most spiritual herbs after the announcement by the Tianxuan Mirror, its price remained steady, showing no significant fluctuations.

“Samantabhadra True Leaf…”

As Li Fan searched through his memories, the Dao Deviation Stone in his mind emitted a faint blue glow.

Moments later, Li Fan showed a trace of interest.

According to his recollection, after the Spirit Mist Grass incident, as abundant byproducts from the Five Elements Cave Heaven began to flood the market, the prices of most spiritual herbs and plants drastically dropped.

However, the Samantabhadra True Leaf was an exception.

In the following decades, the price of Samantabhadra True Leaf steadily increased.

It was just too obscure to attract much attention from cultivators.

So, when Li Fan made a fortune from the speculation surrounding the Spirit Mist Grass and then devoted most of his energy to constructing the Tianxuan Spirit Locking Formation, he naturally overlooked it.

Now, seeing that the Spirit Mist Grass incident was unlikely to occur, Li Fan needed a substitute, and the unusual nature of the Samantabhadra True Leaf caught his attention.

“In my previous life, I remember that after the Tianxuan Spirit Locking Formation became widespread, the Wise Discernment Talisman was gradually phased out. However, its price remained high, indicating that it must have had some unknown uses.”

“All these anomalies suggest that someone is manipulating the market behind the scenes.”

Li Fan carefully considered the feasibility of his plans to either attack Lingwu Island to artificially inflate the price of Spirit Mist Grass or use the Samantabhadra True Leaf as a substitute.

“Whichever method I choose, the end result will surely cause significant upheaval. The Tianji Hall will undoubtedly investigate.”

“Judging from how things were handled in my past life, manipulating the market by buying low and selling high within the allowed rules was acceptable.”

“But if someone intentionally disrupts the market or the economy, it could be deemed a threat to the stability of the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance.”

“Even with my Sky-Shrouding Palm Secret Art, I might not escape scrutiny.”

“…”

After careful consideration, Li Fan made a decision.

“However, I still need to see if the Samantabhadra True Leaf is viable.”

He immediately took action.

Li Fan sold off all his previously acquired Spirit Mist Grass at any cost and began purchasing Samantabhadra True Leaf instead.

In the Tianxuan Mirror, the price of Samantabhadra True Leaf was currently stable at around 280 contribution points per leaf.

Li Fan made a massive purchase worth a million contribution points, sweeping up all available stock.

Soon, the market's inventory visibly dwindled.

Simultaneously, its price began to rise gradually.

It recovered from the recent dip and returned to a normal level, around 300 contribution points.

Li Fan, remaining calm, continued to increase his buying pressure.

Another million contribution points were invested.

301, 302…

The price of Samantabhadra True Leaf was about to break through 305.

At this moment, its price suddenly plummeted, dropping from over 300 back to 292 contribution points in an instant.

“This indicates that someone has released a large quantity of Samantabhadra True Leaf into the market.”

“The Tianxuan Mirror detected an oversupply, leading to a rapid price drop.”

“Interesting.”

A gleam flashed in Li Fan's eyes as he paused his actions to carefully consider the situation.

“Holding a large amount of Samantabhadra True Leaf and intentionally manipulating the price down—why?”

“And in the last life, during the Spirit Mist Grass frenzy, they were able to maintain such tight control over the price of Samantabhadra True Leaf even amidst a general rise in spiritual herb prices.”

“It’s almost certain that they’ve established some kind of monopoly.”

“Confident of victory, are they…”

It wasn’t long before Li Fan connected this to a strategy he had used in his previous life, leading him to a possible conclusion.

Suddenly, Li Fan stood up, exited the Tianxuan Mirror, and headed straight for the Qianli Hall.

From outside, he could hear Jiao Xiuyuan’s disgruntled voice: “Didn’t you say you wanted this Flying Star Disk? I went through so much trouble to dig it out, and now you don’t want it?”

“Can people still do business with any integrity?”

Li Fan interrupted with a smile, “If Nobody wants it? I’ll take it!”

Jiao Xiuyuan, who didn’t know who he was talking to, immediately beamed upon hearing this.

He quickly said, “Deal! Fifteen hundred contribution points, fixed price! No going back on your word!”

He handed over a rusty copper disk.

Li Fan took a glance but didn’t find anything special about it.

However, trusting his past experience, he paid the price and stored it carefully in his storage ring.

“Fellow Daoist Jiao, forget about these small transactions. I’ve got a big deal for you this time!”

Li Fan said seriously.

Jiao Xiuyuan, recognizing Li Fan, thought he was  here to inquire about the sale of the [Illusion-Breaking Stone Eye]. A trace of embarrassment appeared on his dark face.

“Ah! So it’s Daoist Li Fan! My apologies, but that Illusion-Breaking Stone Eye, maybe…”

Li Fan waved his hand to interrupt and pulled Qiao Xiuyuan closer, speaking in a low voice: “Forget about that for now. Fellow Daoist Jiao, I’m serious about what I just said.”

“If you miss this opportunity, your Dao Heart may shatter, and your puppets may suffer significant damage!”

Hearing Li Fan’s ominous warning, Jiao Xiuyuan’s expression instantly changed.

He put away his playful demeanor and looked at Li Fan with a serious expression before closing the doors of Qianli Hall.

“Daoist Li Fan, what do you mean by this?” he asked.

“The Samantabhadra True Leaf. Daoist Jiao, do you know about it? Recently, its price has been behaving unusually. Take a look for yourself,” Li Fan replied.

Jiao Xiuyuan, upon hearing this, closed his eyes to think.

Moments later, his brows furrowed slightly.

At that moment, Li Fan explained the series of tests he had just conducted.

“What do you think?” Li Fan asked, with a hint of appraisal in his tone.

After a moment of contemplation, Jiao Xiuyuan said, “If I’m not mistaken, the other party might have borrowed a certain quantity of Samantabhadra True Leaf from somewhere.”

“And they probably have some extra stock on hand.”

“So they plan to temporarily lower the price by flooding the market, thus reducing their repayment amount and making a profit.”

Jiao Xiuyuan offered his analysis.

Li Fan clapped his hands, saying, “Great minds think alike. I thought the same.”

Jiao Xiuyuan frowned, somewhat dissatisfied: “Is this the big deal you mentioned? I don’t see how it’s a big opportunity.”

Li Fan revealed a mysterious smile.

“What if, and I’m just saying, what if…”

“When the time comes for them to repay the borrowed Samantabhadra True Leaf, the combined market supply isn’t enough for them to fulfill their obligation. What would happen then?”

Jiao Xiuyuan was momentarily puzzled by Li Fan’s words.

He was stunned for a moment.

After a while, a spark of realization flashed in his eyes.

Chapter 458: The Immortals Alliance Has a Rat

Jiao Xiuyuan said excitedly, "You mean, when the time comes, even if someone offers them the Samantabhadra True Leaf at an absurd price, they'll have no choice but to buy it to fulfill their commitments?"

"And if we preemptively take up the majority of the market share of Samantabhadra True Leaf, forcing the other party's hand..."

"Couldn’t we easily make several times the profit?"

"Brilliant!" Jiao Xiuyuan exclaimed, slapping his thigh as he figured out the crux of the plan.

"Daoist Jiao, you truly are a business genius!" Li Fan nodded and praised him.

However, Jiao Xiuyuan didn't dwell on Li Fan's compliment. His expression changed as he furrowed his brows and pondered for a moment.

The excitement on his face gradually faded as he shook his head and said, "Your idea is indeed brilliant, but it seems a bit too idealistic."

"What if, when the other party borrowed the Samantabhadra True Leaf, the contract they signed included a clause allowing them to repay with equivalent contributions?"

"What if they choose to breach the contract, risking backlash, but refuse to buy back the Samantabhadra True Leaf?"

"There are too many uncontrollable factors, too much risk."

Li Fan was a bit dismissive as he said, "Is there any business in the world without risk? Considering the potential profit, I think it's worth a try."

Jiao Xiuyuan's expression shifted slightly as he was about to respond, but then he heard Li Fan say, "Besides, I believe that even if the other party abandons the struggle with us and voluntarily withdraws, we would still profit from the large amount of Samantabhadra True Leaf Leaves we've acquired."

"What do you mean by that?" Jiao Xiuyuan raised an eyebrow, somewhat skeptical.

A faint smile appeared on Li Fan's lips as he extended his right index finger.

In an instant, a translucent icosahedral die appeared in mid-air, spinning rapidly and reflecting numerous fragmented images.

Jiao Xiuyuan froze for a moment before recognizing the treasure in Li Fan's hand and exclaimed, "The Heaven-Earth Divination Die?!"

Just as he was about to take a closer look at the images on the die, Li Fan quickly put it away.

"I've deduced this, and it should be nearly accurate." Li Fan said seriously.

Seeing Li Fan's confidence, Jiao Xiuyuan hesitated for a moment.

"Let me investigate further." With that, the puppet in front of Li Fan suddenly lost its guiding consciousness and became completely still.

Li Fan wasn't in a hurry. He stood quietly by the side, patiently waiting.

He waited for an entire day and night.

When vitality returned to Jiao Xiuyuan, he suddenly opened his eyes, his face beaming with joy. "There's hope!"

"Oh? What did you find out, Daoist Jiao?" Li Fan asked with interest.

Jiao Xiuyuan leaned in and lowered his voice, "According to reliable sources, the manipulation of Samantabhadra True Leaf prices is led by several Soul Transformation cultivators, headed by Tantai Can of Tianshu Prefecture."

"They all have connections to the headquarters of the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance."

"And the ‘Wise Discernment Talisman’ used in various regions is almost entirely monopolized by them."

"Tantai Can..." This surname was too unique, reminding Li Fan of the brilliant Formation path genius, Tantai Tao, who had met an untimely death in his previous life.

"Could it be the same clan?" Li Fan thought to himself, though his expression remained unchanged as he continued listening.

Jiao Xiuyuan continued eagerly, "The truth is slightly different from our speculation. Because they control the production line of the Wise Discernment Talisman, these people have accumulated a large amount of Samantabhadra True Leaf."

"The number of Wise Discernment Talismans collected annually by the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance is limited, and the profits are too slow. So, this group had the audacity to come up with a crooked plan."

"Some of them used part of the Samantabhadra True Leaf they controlled as collateral to borrow a large amount of contribution points from the 'Qingfeng Hall.'"

"Meanwhile, the others borrowed Samantabhadra True Leaf from Qingfeng Hall in return."

"In one go, the Samantabhadra True Leaf returned to their hands while they gained contribution points of equal value through arbitrage."

…

Hearing this, Li Fan frowned and interrupted Jiao Xiuyuan, "I remember, the interest rates at Qingfeng Hall aren't low, right? How much profit can they make from this? And once they have the contribution points, why go through the trouble of lending out the Samantabhadra True Leaf again?"

Jiao Xiuyuan chuckled and said, "This is precisely why I said there’s an opportunity for us."

"Because, technically, these Samantabhadra True Leaf belong to the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance."

"The Wise Discernment Talisman involves the secrets of the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance, so naturally, they need to implement control measures."

"Tantai Can and his group only hold the position of producing the Wise Discernment Talisman because of their backgrounds."

"Periodically, the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance headquarters sends people to conduct routine inspections."

"Although they have internal connections and can receive advance notice, they still have to maintain appearances, and at least on the surface, they can't afford to lose too much."

Jiao Xiuyuan snorted, his eyes flashing with disdain, "Even though the profits from this business are already ridiculously high, they are still not satisfied."

"They privately used it as collateral, exchanged it for a huge amount of contribution points, leveraged the situation, and stirred up trouble in the market."

"And these people have deep backgrounds and are well-informed, so they are always successful and reap significant profits. They don't even care about the interest from Qingfeng Hall."

"Not to mention, almost all of the Samantabhadra True Leaf in the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance are in their hands. Manipulating the price is easy for them, and exploiting unsuspecting cultivators is a piece of cake."

Li Fan slowly nodded, understanding the methods of Tantai Can and his group.

In essence, they were embezzling the strategic resources of the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance to exchange for contribution points.

Then, through insider information, they bought low and sold high to profit for themselves.

"Such a crime is not minor. Daoist Jiao, it’s impressive that you could uncover all this; your abilities must be near divine!" Li Fan regained his composure and clicked his tongue in admiration.

Jiao Xiuyuan waved his hand, "It's just that these people are too arrogant! Not only do they not keep it strictly confidential, but they also use it as bragging material in casual conversations. That's how I found out."
