Just as Li Fan was contemplating where to find more support, an unexpected change suddenly occurred within the Spiritwood Realm.

After Shang Tianci’s relentless efforts day and night, the Spiritwood Realm had undergone a drastic transformation.

Countless magnificent sights of primordial essence adorned the realm. Ethereal spiritual energy connected the underground veins to the sky, as if forming a unified whole.

It seemed as though the entire world was undergoing some profound metamorphosis, with the most significant transformation occurring in the giant spirit tree at the realm’s center.

In a short time, the tree, which had long ceased growing, suddenly shot up by nearly one-third.

Its emerald-green leaves shimmered, radiating an unprecedented vitality.

Something seemed to be gestating within it.

Li Fan's mind stirred. Using the Heart of the Spiritwood, he instantly pinpointed the source of the disturbance.

It was within the central area of the spirit tree, in the space originally meant for nurturing treefolks.

Countless green light particles converged, forming a vague humanoid figure.

"This is...?" Li Fan narrowed his eyes and instantly teleported to the vicinity.

At that moment, the Treefolk Chieftain also rushed over.

She looked at the increasingly distinct humanoid figure forming before them, first in shock, then as if recalling something.

Her expression instantly turned emotional.

"Master, this is a [Tree Spirit]!" she took the initiative to explain to Li Fan.

Through the Treefolk Chieftain’s explanation, Li Fan quickly understood what a [Tree Spirit] truly was.

If treefolk were beings born from the spirit tree to serve as its guardians,

Then their ultimate duty was to protect the tree until it awakened its own sentience.

Compared to Li Fan’s forceful refinement of the Heart of the Spiritwood—his act of seizing control—the Tree Spirit was more like the true ruler of the Spiritwood Realm.

Before Li Fan, a figure gradually took form, completely unadorned.

Its aura was rapidly strengthening.

In an instant, it had already surpassed Li Fan’s Golden Core stage cultivation.

Chapter 825: The Heavenly Dao of the Spiritwood Realm

Li Fan instinctively took a slight step back.

He only relaxed after ensuring, through the Heart of the Spiritwood, that he still held absolute control over the life and death of the Spirit Tree.

The spiritual pressure of the Tree Spirit continued to rise—Nascent Soul, Soul Transformation...

It wasn’t until it reached a level comparable to Dao Integration that it finally stopped.

"A colossal tree-born spirit—it is essentially the manifestation of the Heavenly Dao of the Spiritwood Realm."

"If the Heavenly Dao truly had sentience, then a cave-heaven world would be equivalent to the Nascent Soul realm, while a small world’s level would range from Soul Transformation to Dao Integration depending on its scale."

"Under normal circumstances, given the foundation of the Spiritwood Realm, it would be nearly impossible for a Tree Spirit to attain Dao Integration strength. However, with Shang Tianci continuously transporting the wondrous essence of Xuanhuang into this realm, it has undergone a form of ascension."

"It’s similar to how Mr. Bai previously created a miniature Xuanhuang Realm with his bare hands—except Shang Tianci accomplished it through pure replication."

As Li Fan contemplated, the gathering of green light from all directions gradually ceased.

A figure, with a body nearly indistinguishable from that of a human, appeared before him.

Her form was exquisite and curvaceous, similar to the leader of the Treefolk Clan, with distinctly feminine characteristics.

Li Fan glanced at her and, with a mere thought, used the Heart of the Spiritwood to clothe her.

The Tree Spirit did not resist.

Instead, she curiously examined the garments that had suddenly appeared on her body.

Although her gaze carried a certain innocence, it was by no means ignorant.

Born as a natural spirit and inheriting all of the Spirit Tree’s memories, what she lacked compared to ordinary cultivators was merely experience in interpersonal interactions.

"Even though she has already surpassed me in strength, because I refined the Heart of the Spiritwood early on, she still remains under my control."

As this thought crossed Li Fan’s mind, the Tree Spirit, at his mere will, gracefully knelt before him.

For a Dao Integration cultivator to kneel before a mere Golden Core cultivator—anywhere in the world, this would be considered a grave humiliation.

Yet the Tree Spirit showed no trace of anger.

"Master." She addressed Li Fan naturally.

The creations of Heaven and Earth are inherently pure—they do not possess the deceitful, scheming nature of humans.

Especially in their infancy, they have no concept of hiding their emotions.

Li Fan observed her carefully, ensuring that her submission was genuine before he nodded in satisfaction.

"Since you have taken human form, you should have a name of your own."

"From now on, you shall be called Lin Ling."

As he spoke, Li Fan reached out and tapped Lin Ling's forehead.

A moment later, a red mark appeared between her brows.

"Thank you, Master." Lin Ling was overjoyed to have a name. She bowed to Li Fan once more, repeating the name over and over again.

"She has yet to develop a sense of hierarchy in power. Thus, calling someone weaker than her 'Master' does not bother her in the slightest."

"But as she grows and experiences more of the world, that may change."

"However, breaking free from the restraint of the Heart of the Spiritwood will not be an easy feat."

Li Fan carefully examined the faint connection between himself and Lin Ling, deep in thought.

For the next period of time, Lin Ling demonstrated to Li Fan the immense power she wielded as the incarnation of the Heavenly Dao within the Spiritwood Realm.

She could effortlessly manipulate all the forces of this miniature world and always in the most efficient way possible.

With her help, Shang Tianci’s "transportation" efforts became several times easier.

Lin Ling, however, did not see it as a burdensome task. On the contrary, she seemed to be having great fun.

Her pure and carefree expression deeply captivated the young man, Shang Tianci.

As an incarnation of the Heavenly Dao, Lin Ling's beauty was naturally beyond words—her flawless face had not a single imperfection, and every smile and frown carried an unparalleled charm.

Shang Tianci was utterly mesmerized, unable to look away.

"S-Senior..." After Lin Ling finished her work and was sent off to play elsewhere by Li Fan, Shang Tianci hesitantly approached him, his face flushed.

"Heh, good work." Li Fan patted Shang Tianci’s shoulder with a knowing smile.

He did not make any promises, but Shang Tianci instantly looked as if he had been injected with a surge of boundless energy.

"Senior, the extraordinary scenery of Xuanhuang that I stored in my Heavenly Scene Gourd has almost been fully replicated. So, I’d like to return to the Xuanhuang Realm to record some other scenes."

"Perfect timing. I can also try persuading some others from the Shanhe Pavilion to come along." He volunteered himself.

Seeing his initiative, Li Fan had no reason to refuse.

However, to be cautious, he gifted him a jade pendant to serve as a medium for deploying [Formless Killing Intent].

Only then did he allow him to leave.

After calculating the time, it seemed that he had left the Five Elders Association waiting long enough.

With that in mind, Li Fan leisurely exited the Spiritwood Realm as well.

What he didn’t expect was that upon seeing him leave, Lin Ling also wanted to follow.

"You can leave this place?" Li Fan asked in surprise.

"Master, don’t worry. It’s no problem." Lin Ling nodded firmly.

"However, I might not be as free outside as I am at home," she added.

A free Dao Integration-level bodyguard—how could Li Fan possibly refuse?

When the two arrived at the Xuanhuang Realm, Li Fan immediately observed any changes in her condition.

"She’s still somewhat affected… Her actual combat power is slightly weaker than a true Dao Integration cultivator."

"But she’s still far stronger than an ordinary Soul Transformation cultivator."

Li Fan nodded to himself.

With Lin Ling by his side, he flew toward the direction of Jiushan Prefecture.

Not long after they set off, Lin Ling suddenly asked, "Master, why don’t we travel underground? Flying in the sky is so slow."

Li Fan was momentarily stunned.

"Underground? What do you mean?"

Lin Ling widened her eyes, looking at Li Fan.

She opened her mouth as if to explain, but after a long moment, she couldn’t find the right words.

After a while, she suddenly slapped her forehead and transmitted an image into Li Fan’s mind.

In an instant, Li Fan understood what she meant.

"Earth vein energy?"

"You can use the power of the earth veins to travel?" He couldn’t help but ask.

"Master, you can’t?" Lin Ling looked at him in surprise.

Seeing Li Fan remain silent, Lin Ling thought for a moment before reassuring him, "It’s okay, Master. I think I can take you along."

Sensing the connection, she didn’t seem to be lying.

After hesitating for a moment, Li Fan slowly nodded. "Then let’s give it a try."

"Alright, Master! Hold on to me!" Seeing him agree, Lin Ling became visibly excited.

A layer of green light emerged around her body as she grabbed hold of Li Fan.

Then, in a sudden motion, she dove straight from the sky into the depths of the earth.

Li Fan’s vision went black at first.

Then, it felt as if he had plunged into a raging river—surrounded by surging, earth-yellow energy.

The immense pressure made it difficult for him to breathe.

But Lin Ling, on the other hand, moved as effortlessly as a fish in water.

Not only was she able to maneuver with ease, but she also seemed capable of continuously drawing from the endless power of the earth veins to strengthen herself.

Excitedly shouting along the way, she surged forward, riding the currents of the earth veins.

In less than half the time it takes to drink a cup of tea, the two had already arrived at Jiushan Prefecture.

Chapter 826: The Three Ancient Trees of Xuanhuang

"This is way too fast!"

Li Fan was instantly astonished.

Traveling from the Spiritwood Realm to Jiushan Prefecture required crossing nearly half of Shilin Prefecture.

Under normal circumstances, a Nascent Soul cultivator flying at full speed would need at least five to six days to make the journey.

Even if Lin Ling carried Li Fan through the sky, it would still take at least half a day.

Yet, by borrowing the power of the earth veins, they had arrived almost instantly.

More importantly, traveling underground was silent and unnoticed!

Currently, the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance and the Five Elders Association were in a standoff, with heavy defenses guarding the border between Shilin Prefecture and Jiushan Prefecture.

However, when Li Fan and his group traversed through, neither side detected their presence.

"The power of the earth veins is pure and exclusive. It seems that, as of now, no one in the Xuanhuang Realm has found a way to travel safely through them." Li Fan pondered as he recalled the knowledge he had gathered about earth veins.

Upon reaching Jiushan Prefecture, the flow of the earth veins seemed to encounter some sort of blockage.

What was once a rushing current suddenly slowed to a gentle trickle.

Li Fan could also sense Lin Ling's discomfort.

He signaled for her to return to the surface.

Before emerging, Li Fan carefully observed his surroundings. Only after ensuring that no one was nearby did he break through the earth.

"This place feels so unsettling," Lin Ling frowned.

"Jiushan Prefecture was formed from the corpse of an ancient beast. It’s natural for you to feel a sense of rejection." Li Fan briefly explained.

"This entire region was once a corpse?" Lin Ling’s eyes widened in shock. "Then its power when it was alive must have been terrifying! No wonder even senior cultivators are restricted here..."

She muttered to herself.

"Senior cultivators?" Li Fan’s heart skipped a beat.

"Yes! We were able to move so quickly underground thanks to a senior's help!" Lin Ling said innocently.

As she spoke, she proudly took out a withered branch. "Master, look! This is a gift from that senior."

Li Fan narrowed his eyes.

The branch was dry and yellow, but it did not appear lifeless. Instead, it had been nourished by the power of the earth veins for countless years. From it, he could still sense the vigorous, surging energy of the earth veins.

He had seen such a branch once before.

It was in his 115th lifetime, at Ximen Yu’s cave in Yueyang Prefecture.

"The Tree of Earth Veins?"

He suddenly recalled Ximen Yu’s theory regarding its origins.

Long ago, the Ruomu tree had been gravely wounded by cultivators, causing massive branches to break off and fall to the mortal world.

Over the years, these branches took root and evolved into different ancient trees.

The Tree of Earth Veins was one of them.

Growing in reverse, its roots spread throughout the Xuanhuang Realm.

"How did you communicate with that 'senior'?" Li Fan asked Lin Ling.

Lin Ling tilted her head, looking at Li Fan in confusion.

After a moment, she simply transmitted her entire interaction with the ancient tree to him.

The way ancient trees communicated was vastly different from humans.

The moment Lin Ling entered the earth veins, she and the ancient tree had already formed a connection.

Within an incredibly short time, they had exchanged information.

The ancient Tree of Earth Veins was quite fond of Lin Ling, this newly born junior.

Not only did it refrain from attacking her, but it even actively assisted her.

Additionally, from this ancient tree, Lin Ling learned about the other great ancient trees of the Xuanhuang Realm.

The most ancient of them all, the ancestor of all spirits—Ruomu...

However, the Tree of Earth Veins did not reveal its own name to Lin Ling.

Lin Ling was merely cautioned that the Mother Tree’s temperament had changed drastically, becoming unpredictable and capricious. Even as a fellow tree spirit, it would not receive any special treatment. On the contrary, the Mother Tree might even devour scattered ancient trees like them to nourish itself.

It was best to stay as far away as possible.

Next were two entities on par with the Earth Vein Ancient Tree.

Both had originally separated from the Ruomu Tree in ancient times and were among the strongest of their kind.

One was the Ten Thousand Spirits Ancient Tree, and the other was the Tianhua Ancient Tree.

Although they shared the same origin, they followed entirely opposite paths.

The Ten Thousand Spirits Ancient Tree sought to proliferate as much as possible, spreading countless branches throughout the world.

Even if catastrophe struck, as long as a single branch survived and was given enough time, it could regenerate completely.

The Tianhua Ancient Tree, however, pursued the path of "All Laws Converging into One."

It constantly reduced and refined itself, aspiring to one day return to the existence of the Ruomu Tree.

Glimpses of the Ten Thousand Spirits Ancient Tree and Tianhua Ancient Tree flashed through Li Fan’s mind.

To his surprise, he had encountered both of them in his past reincarnations.

The branches of the Ten Thousand Spirits Ancient Tree turned out to be the very material Jiao Xiuyuan used to craft his clones.

"Spreading branches across the world, covering the Xuanhuang Realm… It subtly aligns with Fellow Daoist Jiao’s Way of Ten Thousand Puppets."

"I just wonder—what exactly is the relationship between Jiao Xiuyuan and the Ten Thousand Spirits Ancient Tree?"

As for the Tianhua Ancient Tree, Li Fan had only encountered it once.

That was in the Qingfeng Hall of the loan organization on Ten Thousand Immortals Island, where he had seen a massive tree with a human face.

In his 115th lifetime, the Five Elders Association launched a surprise attack on Ten Thousand Immortals Island, attempting to relocate the entire island.

At that time, the entire space was sealed off, making all forms of communication and teleportation ineffective.

Li Fan had to pay a hefty price to Jiao Xiuyuan to learn of an escape route.

It was through Qingfeng Hall that he successfully survived the disaster.

"That human-faced tree was one of the sub-bodies of the Tianhua Ancient Tree."

"And that female voice accompanying the spirit tree… I still don’t know who she was."

Besides these two powerful ancient trees, the Earth Vein Ancient Tree also introduced Lin Ling to several younger and slightly weaker tree spirits.

Like Lin Ling, they were trees that had developed sentience, mostly residing in the hidden realms and small worlds of the Xuanhuang Realm.

Since these small worlds were tethered to Xuanhuang, the spirit trees within them maintained a subtle connection with the Earth Vein Ancient Tree.

However, Lin Ling was the first among them who had managed to transform and step into the human world.

This greatly excited the Earth Vein Ancient Tree.

Yet, it showed little concern for the fact that Lin Ling was under the control of a cultivator.

It merely reminded Lin Ling that each spirit tree followed its own destined path.

She should cultivate according to her heart’s true desires.

Having been born only recently, Lin Ling only half-understood these words but obediently nodded.

"I never expected so much to have happened in the blink of an eye."

"And all without me even noticing… Even though I have full control over Lin Ling, it still happened."

"The methods of these ancient trees are truly mysterious and unfathomable."

"Fortunately, both the Earth Vein Ancient Tree and Lin Ling have gentle dispositions. Unlike the Ruomu Tree, which is extremely radical."

"Otherwise, if they had secretly plotted against me together…"

"It would have been difficult to defend against."

Li Fan sighed softly.

Chapter 827: Intimidating the Five Elders Association

At the same time, Li Fan finally understood why neither the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance nor the Five Elders Association could freely traverse the Earth's Veins.

It wasn't a matter of technology.

Rather, it was because traveling through the Earth's Veins would inevitably provoke an attack from the Ancient Veins Trees.

One must remember that these three ancient trees still retained the memories of the siege against the Ruomu tree by cultivators in the past.

Although they did not harbor the same extreme hatred toward cultivators as the Ruomu tree did, their attitude was far from friendly.

As long as no one actively sought trouble, they would remain neutral. But if cultivators tried to take advantage of them and push their limits—

The trees would naturally resist.

The only reason Li Fan could avoid being attacked was purely due to Lin Ling’s presence.

These Ancient Vein Trees were deeply rooted in the land of Xuanhuang.

If one were to forcefully subjugate them, it could very well lead to the collapse of the entire land itself.

By then, who knew how many cultivators would perish in an instant?

Additionally, with the existence of spatial tranfer technology, the need for direct reliance on the power of the Earth's Veins was not particularly high.

Thus, both the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance and the Five Elders Association chose to turn a blind eye to the matter.

“In the future, you should communicate with the senior more often,” Li Fan advised Lin Ling as he glanced at the Vein Tree branch in her hand.

This branch was far more precious than the withered twig that Ximen Yu had found in the Earth Vein roots.

Not only could it accelerate Lin Ling’s growth, but it also enabled instantaneous travel to any location where the power of the Earth’s Veins extended.

It was somewhat similar to Shang Tianci’s Heaven Scene Gourd teleportation technique.

However, Shang Tianci had to manually collect each of Xuanhuang’s unique landscapes into his gourd.

In contrast, the Ancient Earth Veins Tree had already extended its roots to every corner of the Xuanhuang Realm.

“It’s just a pity that only Lin Ling can use it,” Li Fan thought with some regret.

Lin Ling obediently fused the Earth Veins Tree branch into her chest.

With this small matter settled, Li Fan turned his attention back to the real business at hand.

First, he set up a protective formation around them, temporarily concealing Lin Ling.

Then, he retrieved a jade talisman and crushed it.

A unique energy fluctuation spread instantly, rippling outward toward Jiushan Prefecture.

Li Fan closed his eyes and waited.

On the side of the Five Elders Association, they had clearly been waiting for this signal for quite some time.

Not long after, several figures swiftly arrived.

Among them was Yu Dayi, the Five Elders Association spy with whom Li Fan had previously interacted.

After some time apart, Yu Dayi’s cultivation had already advanced from the Golden Core stage to the mid-Nascent Soul stage.

Clearly, he had received rewards for the significant intelligence Li Fan had provided earlier.

Upon spotting Li Fan from a distance, Yu Dayi's face lit up with joy.

As he approached, he gestured for his companions to halt, proceeding alone to meet Li Fan.

“It’s been a long time, Fellow Daoist!” Yu Dayi cupped his hands in greeting.

Li Fan scrutinized him briefly before letting out a sinister chuckle.

“It seems that the intelligence provided by our Federation of All Worlds was of some use after all.”

“Fellow Daoist is too modest. More than just useful…” Yu Dayi replied with a laugh.

“Speaking of which, during our last operation, when we successfully took over Jiushan Prefecture, it seems that your organization also assisted us in secret.”

“You’ve helped us twice now, yet you haven’t made any demands…” A hint of suspicion flickered across Yu Dayi’s face.

“It’s nothing more than a way to gain the trust of your Five Elders Association,” Li Fan said indifferently.

“I know that even now, there are still those within your organization who believe that this so-called ‘Federation of All Worlds’ is nothing more than a fabrication by the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance.”

“Sacrificing a little to deceive a lot…”

As soon as these words were spoken, Yu Dayi’s expression became slightly awkward.

“Doubt is natural. But it doesn’t matter—once our cooperation deepens, all suspicions will eventually vanish into thin air.”

Li Fan let out a low, eerie laugh, his tone filled with confidence.

Yu Dayi didn’t pay attention to other details; his eyes lit up the moment he heard Li Fan mention "cooperation."

And Li Fan did not disappoint him.

With a casual flick of his hand, he tossed over a jade slip.

Yu Dayi caught it, his eyelids twitching, but his face couldn't hide his overwhelming joy.

The content within the jade slip was none other than the vulnerabilities of the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance's recently modified Ten Thousand Mile of Mountain and River Formation.

"Yet another extraordinary feat!" Yu Dayi's heart pounded with excitement.

However, Li Fan's next words were like a bucket of cold water poured over him:

"Although we can provide you with classified information on the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance's defensive formations, making their defenses practically useless to you, our Federation of All Worlds still does not recommend launching a large-scale offensive at this moment."

"Even if you can quickly mobilize enough forces to crush the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance in an instant, it is still unwise."

"Our suggestion—wait." Li Fan's words carried a deep meaning.

"Why is that?" Yu Dayi couldn't help but ask, puzzled.

Li Fan did not answer. He merely extended his index finger and pointed toward the sky.

Yu Dayi remained confused.

"Go back and report my words. They will naturally understand my meaning," Li Fan said indifferently.

"When the time is right, we will inform you."

Yu Dayi opened his mouth but did not argue further.

Li Fan then tossed over another jade slip.

"Our Federation of All Worlds has already shown enough sincerity. Now, let’s see how sincere your Five Elders Association truly is."

Yu Dayi glanced at the list of supplies detailed in the jade slip, and his heart pounded wildly.

"This is... far too much..."

"Just report it as is. As long as they aren't foolish, I believe they will agree," Li Fan said arrogantly.

Yu Dayi discreetly glanced behind him.

The five cultivators accompanying him were standing by, awaiting his command.

With just a single order, they could instantly subdue the mysterious cultivator before them.

"Four Nascent Souls and one Soul Transformation."

"The opponent is merely a small Golden Core."

"No matter how you look at it, the odds are overwhelmingly in our favor."

Yu Dayi felt a strong temptation.

"If we capture him and use secret techniques to turn him, we could extract more secrets about the Federation of All Worlds..."

At that moment, he was on the verge of giving the order.

But then, Li Fan looked at him with a calm, confident gaze—one that carried an almost mocking smile.

Yu Dayi’s heart clenched.

After careful deliberation, he ultimately abandoned the idea.

The unfathomable aura surrounding Li Fan was one reason.

The primary concern, however, was that the Federation of All Worlds had always been the one initiating contact with the Five Elders Association.

If something went wrong and hostility was created between the two sides…

That would truly be a disastrous loss.

After all, supplies have a price—intelligence is priceless.

In an instant, countless thoughts flashed through Yu Dayi’s mind.

In the end, he sighed inwardly and cupped his hands in respect.

"Fellow Daoist, return in seven days. You shall receive a satisfactory answer."

"Good! I hope your Five Elders Association won’t make a foolish mistake. Otherwise, we may have to seek a new partner," Li Fan said before clapping his hands.

From the side, Lin Ling, who had been concealed all along, finally revealed herself.

Sensing Lin Ling's aura, Yu Dayi's pupils contracted sharply.

Chapter 828: The Majestic Five Elemental Cave-Heavens

A faint aura of pressure emanated from the other party, and Yu Dayi was almost certain—she was at the Dao Integration realm!

Had he chosen to act just moments ago, he and his group would have undoubtedly been the ones to perish!

The realization that he had narrowly brushed past death caused cold sweat to break out on Yu Dayi’s forehead.

"This Federation of All Worlds is truly deceitful! Sending a mere Golden Core cultivator for a transaction, yet secretly having a Dao Integration powerhouse as backup." Yu Dayi cursed inwardly.

"Fortunately, I was cautious enough!"

Just as he was about to bow to Lin Ling in greeting, a layer of green light suddenly enveloped both her and Li Fan.

Moments later, their figures vanished into thin air.

Only the members of the Five Elders Association remained, their hearts still lingering in fear.

"How did they leave? Did any of you see what happened?" Yu Dayi narrowed his eyes as he carefully observed his surroundings before turning to ask his companions.

"There were no fluctuations in spatial energy. Even if they had escaped at extreme speed, there should have been some traces left behind. But in just an instant… they disappeared completely."

Almost instinctively, everyone turned their gazes toward the ground.

"The Earth Veins…" Yu Dayi muttered in contemplation, a grave expression flashing across his face.

Once again traversing through the surging Earth Veins, Lin Ling did not immediately return to the Spiritwood Realm.

Instead, at Li Fan’s suggestion, she swiftly made her way toward Tianling Prefecture.

Not long ago, Tianyang had sent a message—he had arrived near the Five Elemental Great Cave Heaven.

So far, he had not discovered any Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance cultivators guarding the area.

Li Fan instructed Tianyang to wait on standby and not to enter rashly.

A few hours later, Lin Ling met up with Li Fan and Tianyang.

Lin Ling was quite curious about the dull-witted Tianyang.

Yet, Tianyang acted as if he didn’t even see her, standing silently beside Li Fan.

Li Fan first surveyed the surrounding environment.

The entrance to the Five Elemental Grand Cave-Heaven remained largely unnoticed by passing cultivators.

"I wonder what event will eventually lead to its discovery?"

As he pondered this, his hands moved without hesitation.

In his Sea of Consciousness, the Dissociation Disc emitted a soft, radiant glow.

First, Li Fan deployed the [Sky-Shrouding Hand] secret technique to prevent his aura from leaking. Then, he quickly arranged the infinite formation derived from the Dissociation Disc, sealing off the entrance.

Though this method seemed somewhat counterintuitive—drawing attention instead of diverting it—it would at least buy some time before the cave heaven was exposed.

"If I don’t do this, the Five Elemental Great Cave-Heaven will be discovered for sure. With these precautions, I can delay things."

"Moreover, the combination of the Infinite Formation and the Sky-Shrouding Hand technique should be enough to deceive an ordinary Dao Integration cultivator—as long as they’re not specifically searching for it."

"I just need to stall until I reach peak Golden Core, then I can devour it completely."

With this thought in mind, Li Fan swiftly completed the setup, completely concealing the entrance to the Five Elemental Cave-Heaven.

Then, he led Lin Ling and Tianyang inside.

"Huh?"

The moment they stepped into the cave heaven, Lin Ling gasped in surprise.

Her gaze was fixed on the Wood-attribute cave heaven within.

There stood a massive tree—so immense that it seemed to reach the heavens.

In terms of sheer size, it even surpassed Lin Ling’s true body within the Spiritwood Realm.

"Are any of your seniors here?" Li Fan asked.

Lin Ling observed for a while before shaking her head in disappointment.

At the same time, her expression was somewhat strange:

"According to the seniors of the Earth Vein, at this stage, it should have already awakened its own consciousness. How strange... Could something be missing here?"

Upon hearing this, Li Fan also fell into deep thought.

"The difference between a Cave-Heaven and a Small World is not just a matter of size. This Five Elements Great Cave-Heaven is far more expansive than Spiritwood, or even Great Xuan and Outer Great Li Realm."

"Yet, it still remains within the category of a Cave-Heaven."

Li Fan carefully recalled the process in his 115th lifetime when Mr. Bai single-handedly created a miniature Xuanhuang World. He pondered where exactly the dividing line between a Cave-Heaven and a Small World lay.

After much thought without reaching a conclusion, Li Fan could only set the matter aside for now.

Instead of rushing to explore this wood-element Cave-Heaven, he first searched for traces of the other Cave-Heavens.

"At this moment, among the Five Elements, only the wood-element Cave Heaven has manifested. The other four—metal, water, fire, and earth—are all hidden."

"However, the Five Elements circulate as one. Since I have personally witnessed the full scope of the Cave-Heaven before, finding them shouldn't be too difficult."

Closing his eyes, Li Fan swept his spiritual sense across the wood-element Cave Heaven, tracing the flow of wood-element spiritual energy and its transformations in this realm.

It didn't take long before he discovered the passages leading to both the fire-element and water-element Cave Heavens.

However, Li Fan did not enter immediately.

Instead, he searched for the passage leading beyond the void where all five great Cave-Heavens converged.

Unlike the vast passageways he had previously encountered, this place had yet to be developed by the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance.

Not only were the pathways narrow and difficult to find, but even the Void outside the Cave Heaven was covered only by a thin layer.

So, Li Fan simply used the Myriad Forms Furnace Technique to shapeshift into a Rift Whale.

This slightly expanded the Void, making it easier to stand upon.

After considerable effort, Li Fan once again beheld the full grandeur of the Five Elements Great Cave-Heaven.

Five enormous, interlocking rings—almost as if they were seamlessly connected—blended together like a palette of swirling colors.

Since the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance had yet to exploit and excavate the region excessively, the Cave-Heavens were still full of vibrant life.

From a distant vantage point, one could even faintly sense their unified and boundless aura.

"Tsk tsk, this sight is completely different from the one I saw before, when the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance had ravaged the land."

"I still don't know what exactly they did in that lifetime, mobilizing their entire force and nearly emptying out these Five Elements Cave Heavens."

"However, if this lifetime reaches a desperate situation... perhaps I'll have the chance to find out."

Li Fan observed for a long time before finally returning to the wood-element Cave Heaven.

Along the way, he even expanded the passage further.

Only then did the three of them finally have the opportunity to carefully examine the full scope of the wood-element Cave Heaven.

A towering tree, its canopy occupying nearly a third of the sky, came into view.

The sheer pressure it exuded was overwhelming.

Even Lin Ling seemed to feel a slight discomfort.

Strangely, despite the massive spiritual tree dominating most of the wood-element Cave Heaven, it had not encroached upon the survival of other living beings. Instead, it radiated a rich vitality, nourishing everything around it.

The closer one got to the tree’s main body, the denser the life force became—almost forming a faint green mist.

Countless varieties of plants and herbs flourished in full bloom.

Even though Li Fan had extensively studied the Heavenly Doctor’s Immortal Scripture, a single sweep of his gaze still revealed countless species he couldn't name.

At that moment, Li Fan finally understood what the Tianxuan Mirror meant when it described the wood-element Cave Heaven as:

"This Cave Heaven is vast in scale, with an extremely high concentration of wood-element spiritual energy. The variety of spiritual herbs and medicinal plants is astonishingly abundant."

At this moment, this Cave-Heaven belonged entirely to Li Fan!

"Compared to my newborn Five Elements Cave-Heaven in my previous life, this one is far richer in resources. I can’t even begin to imagine how long the Xuanhuang World must have taken to nurture it."

Chapter 829: Farewell, Senior Sister Zhao

"Compared to this, the Medicine King Valley of my past life was nothing more than a minor presence."

"Just this Wood-attribute Cave Heaven alone is enough to support the rise of a great power."

"Not to mention, there are still four other elemental Cave-Heavens."

Having arrived early in the Xuanhuang Realm and intercepted the discovery made by the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance, Li Fan felt immensely pleased with himself.

After taking a general tour, he proceeded to visit the Fire, Earth, Metal, and Water Cave-Heavens one by one.

Li Fan had once spent a long time in the Water-attribute Cave-Heavens.

But only now did he realize that what he had seen back then was merely a nearly emptied remnant.

Unlike now, where beneath the vast, thriving ocean, countless fish species thrived and multiplied.

An endless number of Water-attribute spiritual herbs and spirit mines filled the entire sea region.

Even someone as knowledgeable as Li Fan couldn’t help but marvel repeatedly.

The Metal-attribute Cave-Heavens was a vast, boundless underground world, filled with rare ore veins and metallic lifeforms.

The Fire-attribute Cave-Heavens was somewhat similar to the fire world on the other side of Great Li, though not as violent.

As for the Earth-attribute Cave Heaven, it was a continuous, unbroken expanse of mountain ranges.

…

After casually touring around, Li Fan felt satisfied but was also struck by a realization.

That was—the Five Elements Great Cave-Heavens were simply too vast.

If he wanted to devour them using his Golden Core cultivation to achieve the Nascent Soul stage…

It would take at least three to five years, if not more.

And that was assuming no one else discovered it, there were no interruptions,

And that the Five Elements Great Cave-Heavens themselves did not resist.

In reality, when something reached the scale of the Five Elements Great Cave-Heavens, even if it had not yet attained the level of a "Small World,"

It was already almost indistinguishable from an actual "world."

Li Fan still clearly remembered how, when they previously tried to set up the Tianxuan Spirit-Locking Formation to cover the entire Cave-Heavens again,

They were met with fierce resistance from the Cave Heaven’s consciousness.

Countless bizarre, endlessly spawning creatures were generated to launch relentless attacks.

Even with Lin Ling guarding him, he might not have been able to endure it.

"Being too greedy is also a problem," Li Fan couldn’t help but frown slightly.

Though difficult, he had no intention of giving up on the Five Elements Great Cave-Heavens.

His own cultivation didn’t matter as much.

The most crucial thing was ensuring that the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance did not get their hands on it.

Otherwise, it could introduce unpredictable variables into this era’s war.

"I’ll figure something out while I still have time before reaching the peak of Golden Core. If nothing else works, I’ll just have to take the slow and steady approach."

Li Fan lingered in the Five Elements Great Cave-Heavens for some time.

It was only when the appointed time with the Five Elders Association was approaching that he finally departed.

"If I can get help from two Dao Integration cultivators, I might be able to move the entrance of the Five Elements Cave-Heavens. But the commotion would be huge, and there’s a chance the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance could discover it."

After concealing the entrance once more, Li Fan left with these thoughts.

Once again, he relied on Lin Ling to travel through the earth veins.

Before long, the three of them silently returned to Jiushan Prefecture.

As they exited the earth veins, Li Fan surprisingly sensed a rare emotion of reluctance coming from Tianyang.

"Tianyang was created through the Earth-Fire Return-to-Origin Formation, so it seems the power of the earth veins holds some special significance for him."

"It might be useful for Lin Ling to take him around more often. The earth vein energy in the Xuanhuang Realm is unimaginably vast. Taking advantage of it shouldn’t be an issue—the Earth Vein Ancient Tree probably wouldn’t mind."

Thinking this, Li Fan gave Lin Ling these instructions.

Lin Ling had a favorable impression of Tianyang and agreed immediately.

Arriving at another location, Li Fan once again crushed a jade talisman, releasing a wave of energy.

Not long after, Yu Dayi hurried over.

This time, he didn’t bring a large entourage—only one other person accompanied him.

And the moment Li Fan laid eyes on this person, alarm bells rang in his mind.

He had clearly never met them before, yet from this person, Li Fan sensed an incredibly familiar aura.

The answer was obvious—this person was one of Senior Sister Zhao’s "United as One" incarnations!

However, Senior Sister Zhao did not appear in her usual female form this time.

Instead, she had taken the guise of a fifteen- or sixteen-year-old, extraordinarily handsome young man.

"So, this is the Daoist friend from the [Federation of All Worlds]?" He looked at Li Fan and asked with a smile.

His eyes swept over Li Fan, as if trying to see through all his secrets.

Li Fan felt a chill in his heart, but he remained calm despite the shock.

Senior Sister Zhao had many bodies, and the one before him was merely at the Soul Transformation stage.

Moreover, even a Immortal Ancestor could not be omniscient.

So, Li Fan was not too worried that his secrets would be exposed at a glance.

He composed himself, pondered for a moment, then narrowed his eyes and directly chose to "play the general."

"Heh, to think that even a Heavenly Sovereign would personally come. What an honor!" He revealed a strange smile and stared at Senior Sister Zhao as he spoke.

The smile on the young man’s face instantly froze.

Only now did he truly take a serious look at Li Fan.

Meanwhile, Yu Dayi, who stood to the side, seemed unaware of the true identity of the cultivator next to him. Upon hearing Li Fan’s words, he was momentarily stunned, looking somewhat confused.

But since he was a native cultivator of the Five Elders Association, he quickly put the pieces together.

His head suddenly snapped toward the young man, whose face now bore a playful smile, and his expression turned stiff.

His body began to tremble uncontrollably.

"Oh my, I’ve been seen through."

"How interesting. It seems that this so-called [Federation of All Worlds] does have some skill after all."

"I wonder… would you welcome me to join?"

The young man chuckled softly, but his voice carried the seductive charm of a woman.

It should have sent shivers down one’s spine, but to Li Fan, it didn’t feel uncomfortable at all.

"Haha, actually, I’d like to join your Heavenly Sovereign’s Grand Dao Sect instead."

Li Fan quickly countered, showing no hesitation.

However, Senior Sister Zhao was not angered. Instead, she let out a charming laugh.

"If we merge together, that wouldn’t be impossible either…"

Yu Dayi, listening from the side, broke into a cold sweat, his legs turning weak.

He could only curse his misfortune for not being deaf—now he had heard a conversation of such unbridled recklessness from a Heavenly Sovereign.

At the same time, he mentally placed both the [Federation of All Worlds] and Li Fan into the category of people he must never provoke.

Li Fan gave an awkward chuckle but did not respond.

Instead, he shifted the topic and got straight to business.

"Where is the item we need?"

Senior Sister Zhao casually tossed over a piece of [Voidbright Stone Mother].

Li Fan caught it skillfully and examined it.

It was exactly as listed on his request—no discrepancies.

He stored it away.

"Aren’t you afraid that I might have tampered with it?" Senior Sister Zhao suddenly asked in a ghostly tone.

"Senior Sister, you are upright and honorable. You wouldn’t do such a thing." Li Fan replied confidently.

At this, Senior Sister Zhao’s expression completely shifted.

"Since you personally came, I’ll offer you an extra piece of top-secret information for free."

"The Samantabhadra True Leaves can be used to craft Divine Vessels, allowing one to travel through the White Mist without suffering the effects of its essence-draining properties."

Li Fan transmitted his voice directly to her.

Then, without waiting for a response, a green light enveloped him—he vanished on the spot.

Yu Dayi dared not move an inch.

"A woman’s thoughts are truly hard to predict."

Before long, only Senior Sister Zhao’s light laughter echoed through the air.

Chapter 830: Skillful Resolution of the Crisis

Although Li Fan verbally expressed his trust that Senior Sister Zhao would never secretly tamper with anything, he did not immediately return to the Spiritwood Realm after leaving Jiushan Prefecture.

Instead, he quietly made a trip back to Congyun Sea.

Aside from treasures containing the power of the Heavenly Sovereigns, such as the True Temptation Fruit, he handed over all other regular supplies to his clone, Ji Shaoli.

His plan was to use the Tianxuan Mirror to "cleanse" these items—selling them and then buying them back—to remove any potential traces left on them.

Even the highly valuable Voidbright Stone Mother, which could be used to refine spatial magical treasures, was not spared.

Although this process would result in some loss of contribution points, it was a worthwhile trade-off to reduce the risk of being targeted by the Longevity Immortal Heavenly Sovereign.

Of course, since this was currently the period of war between the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance and the Five Elders Association, Ji Shaoli would need some time to complete the cleansing of these supplies to avoid raising suspicion.

However, with the assistance of several other members of the Congyun Sea Mutual Aid Association, the process would not take too long.

"As for those supreme treasures infused with the power of the Heavenly Sovereigns, since they contain the power of other Heavenly Sovereigns, even if Senior Sister Zhao wanted to tamper with them, it wouldn’t be easy."

These were purely law-constructed artifacts, and Li Fan had encountered similar items in his past life.

After carefully examining them and confirming that there were no issues, he finally felt at ease.

Despite his calm demeanor during the transaction, when Senior Sister Zhao’s voice echoed in his mind, memories of their intimate moments in the illusionary realm uncontrollably surfaced.

Fortunately, Li Fan had a strong temperament and also possessed a mind-refining secret technique.

Suppressing these distracting thoughts in time, he managed to avoid making any mistakes.

Moreover, he turned the situation around by inadvertently revealing an in-depth understanding of the Grand Dao Sect, thereby misleading Senior Sister Zhao and making her suspicious.

This reduced the enchanting aura she unconsciously emitted, allowing Li Fan to gain the upper hand.

"As expected of the Longevity Immortal Heavenly Sovereign—even if it’s just one of her bodies, it still requires my full effort to deal with," Li Fan couldn't help but sigh.

He set aside some Carefree Crystals and Human Dao Stardust on Haixuan Island.

A month later, the members of the Mutual Aid Association had completed most of the material cleansing.

Only then did Li Fan return to the Spiritwood Realm with Lin Ling and Tianyang.

During their month-long stay on the island, Pei Tuo, Xiang Xin, and others had the rare opportunity to catch a glimpse of Lin Ling and Tianyang.

Even though Lin Ling and Tianyang had not deliberately displayed their strength, the faint pressure exuded from them still left the Mutual Aid Association members in awe.

This only reinforced their belief that the Mutual Aid Association was a vast and powerful organization.

They realized that the Congyun Sea branch was merely in its infancy.

Secretly, they felt fortunate to have joined the Mutual Aid Association in its early stages, strengthening their loyalty to the organization.

Meanwhile, during this same month, the Five Elders Association seemed to have heeded Li Fan’s parting advice and significantly slowed their offensive.

The border conflicts gradually subsided.

However, the Five Elders Association did not remain idle.

Suddenly, various rumors and scandals began to spread throughout the different prefectures under the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance.

Although these were mostly old stories, they still stirred unrest within the alliance.

For example, in the Tianquan Prefecture Martial Hall, a certain squad leader once killed an ordinary cultivator out of personal resentment.

According to the laws of the Immortal Alliance, he should have been dismissed and investigated.

However, the matter was repeatedly delayed until it faded from public attention.

Recently, someone brought it up again, and people were shocked to realize that this squad leader had been living comfortably all these years.

In the end, he had merely been given a minor salary reduction as a punishment!

Similarly, in Youtai Prefecture’s Administrative Hall, a certain official had neglected his duties, leading to a preventable natural disaster that resulted in the deaths of hundreds of cultivators.

At the time, the official was dismissed.

However, upon recent investigation, it was discovered that just a few years later, this very same official had resurfaced in Tianyu Prefecture, where he was appointed to an even higher position than before!

…

All these old cases erupted at once!

Even the vast majority of them were things Li Fan had never even heard of.

They were dark secrets forgotten by history.

Yet at this moment, under the influence of some mysterious force, they suddenly resurfaced!

Naturally, the cultivators of the Immortal Alliance were furious.

Although no major acts of discord had occurred yet, rebellious sentiments were already spreading in secret across various regions. Statements such as:

"The Immortal Alliance is rotten; it's not worth risking our lives for!"

"You send me to die while you enjoy luxury? We might as well perish together!"

These defiant thoughts were circulating underground.

The Immortal Alliance took this matter seriously and ordered strict investigations in every province.

But how could mere orders silence the voices of the masses so easily?

Rather than improving, the situation only worsened.

Their usual tactic of delaying—which had always been effective—suddenly seemed useless.

Seven days, fifteen days, a month…

As time passed, the negative news from before had yet to fade, and new revelations of past dark incidents continued to emerge.

This threw the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance into complete disarray.

Meanwhile, the clone of Ji Shaoli eagerly collected and organized these "dark secrets," memorizing them carefully.

"I never expected the Five Elders Association to have such a move up their sleeve."

"But these are priceless treasures!"

"Repeated forgetting can indeed suppress negative emotions, but on the flip side, if all these forgotten memories resurface and explode in a short time..."

"The destruction it would cause would be terrifying."

"No less than an army of a million!"

"Hmm, perhaps this is also related to the fact that the ‘Carefree Heavenly Sovereign’ has momentarily withdrawn the power of forgetfulness covering the territories of the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance."

"These are all methods I can replicate in the future to attack the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance. I must study them well."

Ji Shaoli clicked his tongue in admiration at the unexpected gift from the Five Elders Association.

Then, a month and a half after the incident erupted, the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance finally made its counterattack.

Their response completely exceeded Li Fan’s expectations.

But upon closer reflection, he couldn’t help but slam the table in admiration.

"Brilliant!"

"There are true strategists within the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance!"

Their move was simple.

They did not forcibly suppress cultivators.

They did not prohibit discussions of the incidents.

Instead, they made a single public announcement:

The next Immortal Alliance Entry Examination would be moved up to six months from now.

To counter the aggressive offensive of the Five Elders Association, the recruitment quota would be increased by 50% compared to previous years.

The moment this news was released, the entire world was shaken!

Everyone despised privilege—yet everyone desired to have privilege!

The dark secrets that had been spreading were accusations of injustice.

But at the same time, they served as the perfect advertisement.

Do you want to be a victim in these events?

Or do you want to rise above the rest?

If your heart stirs at the thought—then come and take the test!

With nearly half more slots available, the chances of passing were greater than ever.

Immediately, cultivators of the Immortal Alliance were filled with anticipation.

And just like that, the storm began to subside on its own.

Chapter 831: Everything Flourishes

The cultivators no longer discussed the dark past that had been exposed. After all, they had heard too much of it to be surprised anymore.

Instead, they eagerly gathered information about the past entrance examinations for joining the Immortal Alliance.

They clenched their fists in determination, swearing to become part of the Immortal Alliance system.

A crisis that could have led to internal strife had thus been quietly resolved.

The resolution was so skillful that even after half a month had passed, Li Fan still found himself reviewing it in his mind, secretly marveling at it.

"With a mere gesture, the crisis was eliminated without a trace."

"And all it took... was a single announcement."

Li Fan couldn't help but feel admiration from the bottom of his heart.

After all, he couldn't think of a better way to handle it.

"The entrance examination for joining the Immortal Alliance in half a year is such a grand event. How can I not get a share of the pie...?"

"However, even though this world is still in its early stages, its trajectory has already begun to shift significantly. Those test questions should also have changed."

With this thought, information on past entrance examinations that he had collected flashed through Li Fan’s mind.

"Despite all the changes, the essence remains the same. Although I can't predict the exact questions, creating a general question bank shouldn’t be difficult."

He casually took out a blank jade slip. At that moment, the Dao Deviation Stone crystal in his mind suddenly emitted a brilliant blue light.

Then, an overwhelming amount of data surged madly into the jade slip.

It took the time of an entire incense stick to completely inscribe all the information.

"Now that the Dao Deviation Stone has been upgraded to a mid-grade level, its efficiency has significantly improved. Computational power has directly doubled."

Li Fan ran his fingers across the smooth surface of the jade slip, nodding in satisfaction.

The Dao-Transforming Stone had finally advanced, thanks to his persistent efforts to merge with the stone from Yi Yin's tomb in every reincarnation.

However, the lower-grade Dao Deviation Stone provided by the Five Elders Association in this transaction was also crucial.

Even though it was of the same lower grade, its quality far surpassed the one from Yi Yin’s tomb—almost infinitely close to the mid-grade level.

After absorbing it, the Dao Deviation Stone in Li Fan’s sea of consciousness instantly advanced to mid-grade.

"It’s a pity that the Five Elders Association was only willing to provide one piece. They were even more willing to offer additional Heavenly Sovereign Artifacts than to give me another Dao Deviation Stone."

"Could it be that they have some special use for it?"

Li Fan frowned in thought, but after a moment, he let it go.

Although Heavenly Sovereign Artifacts were incredibly valuable, they could at least be reproduced. Compared to the Dao Deviation Stone, which decreased in quantity with each use, it was hard to say which was more valuable.

"Hmm... The Immortal Alliance entrance examination question bank—perhaps I can trade it for more stones from them."

"Whether they use it to plant spies or sabotage the examination, it will be highly useful."

Li Fan began making calculations in his mind.

"Tianci!"

After a moment, he called out.

A shadow flashed, and Shang Tianci immediately rushed over with eager obedience.

Now that Lin Ling was around, the once brainwashed hot-blooded youth was even more devoted to Li Fan, doing everything he could to prove himself.

Previously, when he was sent out to scout, he no longer treated it as a sightseeing tour. Instead, he quickly visited the required locations and immediately rushed back.

Fortunately, he could use the Heavenly Scene Treasure Gourd for teleportation. Otherwise, such long-distance travel in such a short time would have exhausted him to death.

Despite all his efforts, Tianyang's arrival had still made him feel an immense sense of crisis.

Compared to the talkative and fawning Shang Tianshi, Lin Ling seemed more interested in the taciturn, wooden Tianyang.

This worried Shang Tianci immensely. Left with no choice, he decided to take a roundabout approach—trying to please Li Fan to win favor.

"Senior, what are your orders?"

Li Fan casually tossed the jade slip to him. "Make a hundred copies of this jade slip first."

"Got it!" Thinking it was an easy task, Shang Tianci immediately agreed.

However, when he took the jade slip and carefully examined its contents, he first let out a painful cry and clutched his forehead.

Then, he exclaimed in shock, "Senior, this is way too much!"

"If it weren't a lot, I could have carved it myself. Why would I need you?" Li Fan snorted coldly.

"Remember, this is urgent. Give it to me within seven days."

Shang Tianci's face twisted in bitterness. Seeing Li Fan's serious expression, he didn't dare to protest. Gritting his teeth, he went off to complete the task.

Meanwhile, Li Fan turned his gaze to the vast land of the Spiritwood Realm, where the treefolks were tirelessly toiling.

"Unfortunately, it seems that these treefolks creations do not fall under the scope of the Sitting Immortal Art."

Compared to when Li Fan had first entered the Spiritwood Realm, the overall strength of the treefolks had significantly improved.

The largest group of them had advanced from early Qi Condensation to late Qi Condensation.

Moreover, treefolks with Foundation Establishment and Golden Core-level strength had begun emerging in great numbers.

The female Treefolks Chieftain had gained the most from these changes—she could now fight evenly against an ordinary Soul Transformation cultivator.

Such rapid progress was primarily due to Shang Tianci's continuous transportation of Xuanhuang Scenes.

More importantly, it was the treasure obtained from the latest transaction with the Five Elders Association: [Heavenly Drops and Earthly Dew]

This item was the sacred treasure of the ancient Divine Wood Sect, offering unparalleled benefits to plant life across the world.

Even though there was only a single drop, the Spirit Tree had still grown another fifty percent in size.

Its canopy had now reached the sky, looking as if it was about to pierce through the heavens.

This transformation benefited Lin Ling the most.

From barely possessing Dao Integration combat strength at birth, she had now solidly stepped into the Dao Integration realm within just a month.

And considering the Ancient Earth Vein Tree elder's silent guidance...

"Truly, comparing oneself to others only leads to frustration."

"Even forming a Nascent Soul is a struggle for me."

At the same time, Li Fan began to sense a fundamental truth—once resources reached a certain level, nurturing powerful cultivators became an incredibly simple matter.

"The prestigious families of the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance surely aren't as straightforward as they appear on the surface."

After pondering for a moment, Li Fan refocused his attention on the countless treefolks spread across the land.

Their tasks were broadly divided into two categories.

One group was responsible for constructing the Federation of All Worlds's architectural complex.

The other group was transporting various materials to designated locations across the Spiritwood Realm in preparation for Formation Refining.

Formation Refining was a specialized method of refining magical treasures.

Besides the conventional techniques of fire refinement and blood essence refinement, this unique method involved engraving intricate formation patterns onto treasures.

Not only did this allow complete control over the artifact, but it also amplified its power using formation arrays.

Li Fan was not particularly skilled in the art of artifact refinement, and he certainly wasn’t going to start learning from scratch just to refine a single magical treasure.

However, since he possessed the supreme treasure, Final Dissociation Disc, Formation Refining was the perfect choice for him.

That said, after several transformations, the Spiritwood Realm had already expanded far beyond an ordinary small world.

Successfully refining it would take time and careful effort.

Chapter 832: The Mountain Collapses Once More

To be honest, constructing the Federation of All Worlds headquarters with grandeur and authenticity is no easy task.

Setting aside the issues of overall planning and how to complete the vast architectural complex, even designing a structure worthy of the name Federation of All Worlds requires considerable effort.

Fortunately, Li Fan had previously overseen the reconstruction of Congyun Immortal City, so he had some experience in this area.

He had also communicated extensively with the master architects sent by the Immortal Alliance Headquarters to assist with construction.

Thus, objectively speaking, the blueprint personally designed by Li Fan was not bad.

However...

Li Fan still felt that something was missing.

"After all, I am self-taught and not a professional."

"It seems I need to find a reliable person to oversee this project."

Li Fan could not stay in the Spiritwood Realm indefinitely.

Now that Lin Ling had made significant breakthroughs in strength and had received substantial resource support from the Five Elders Association, it was time to consider Tianyang’s Dao Integration Plan.

Attempting to refine the Spirit of Heaven and Earth was an incredibly risky endeavor, even with the detailed intelligence provided by Mr. Bai. Despite having an in-depth understanding of the Spirit of Heaven and Earth, success was not guaranteed, and the process still carried considerable risks.

Therefore, Li Fan had to be as well-prepared as possible.

If Tianyang successfully merged with the Dao, Li Fan’s next step would be to devour the Five Elements Great Cave Heaven and return to the Nascent Soul True Lord realm.

He would undoubtedly be extremely busy.

Thus, before all this, he needed a trustworthy person to oversee the Spiritwood Realm’s construction.

Many cultivators’ names flashed through his mind.

A moment later, Li Fan locked onto his target—

Master Architect, Ou Daozi.

Although only at the Soul Transformation True Monarch level, Ou Daozi possessed unparalleled talent and insight in architectural design.

It was said that many buildings within the Immortal Alliance Headquarters were his creations.

His expertise had even been sought during the renovation and reconstruction of Immortal Alliance Immortal City.

However, after his blueprint designs were completed, the Immortal Alliance forcibly erased his memories, an act that left him deeply dissatisfied.

As a result, he chose to retreat into seclusion and never contributed to the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance again.

Even though he held no official position, he was still not someone Li Fan could easily invite at the moment.

Thus, Li Fan planned to use the True Temptation Fruit directly.

Given Ou Daozi’s remarkable talents and formidable strength, this wouldn’t be a waste.

The only challenge was how to deceive or convince him to consume the True Temptation Fruit.

Having some experience in such matters, Li Fan prepared several contingency plans, ready to act accordingly.

If all else failed, he would resort to forceful persuasion.

After staying in the Spiritwood Realm for a few more days and collecting a hundred Immortal Alliance Entrance Examination question sets replicated by Shang Tianci, he set off with Lin Ling and Tianyang.

As before, they traveled through the underground ley lines.

With Lin Ling’s presence, traversing the Xuanhuang Realm had become far more convenient.

Half a day later, they arrived at their destination—

Guanglan Prefecture, Revival Mountain.

This prefecture was located in the southern region of the Immortal Alliance. It was relatively remote and not particularly prosperous, similar in rank to Congyun Sea Prefecture.

However, Revival Mountain within its borders was somewhat well-known.

Originally, the mountain had a different name—Baoyuan Mountain.

Two years ago, a sudden and violent earthquake struck the normally peaceful Guanglan Prefecture.

Tens of thousands of cultivators personally witnessed Baoyuan Mountain collapsing amidst deafening roars.

The catastrophic event lasted for half a day, and countless cultivators were unable to escape in time, perishing within the disaster.

Just as the survivors were reeling from shock, something utterly astonishing occurred.

Before the eyes of countless cultivators, the Baoyuan Mountain, which had crumbled into a bottomless abyss, miraculously reappeared, enveloped in a golden-yellow radiance!

At that moment, it was as if shattered porcelain had been perfectly restored—like spilled tea returning to the cup from the river.

As if time had reversed, the ruins of Baoyuan Mountain were restored to their original state!

Such an extraordinary event was bound to cause a great sensation.

However, because it was too mystical, those who had not witnessed it firsthand simply refused to believe it.

Yet, while the mountain had reappeared, the consequences of its collapse had not disappeared.

The cultivators who perished in the landslide, as well as the tremors in the earth veins caused by the mountain's collapse, were undeniable facts.

Thus, after extensive investigation and verification, even the skeptical cultivators had no choice but to accept the reality of the situation.

They became increasingly curious—how had such a miraculous event occurred?

The Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance was no exception.

They dispatched multiple investigation teams over time, combing through every inch of Baoyuan Mountain.

Yet, they still failed to uncover the cause.

As time passed without any breakthroughs, the alliance eventually ceased its large-scale investigation, leaving only a single investigator stationed there to keep watch.

Occasionally, cultivators who had heard rumors about the past event would visit the site, eager to uncover the truth.

Because of this phenomenon, Baoyuan Mountain was given a new name—Revival Mountain.

However, Revival Mountain’s scenery was quite ordinary, lacking any special attractions. Over time, fewer and fewer people visited, and it gradually faded from memory.

During one of his past reincarnations, Li Fan had taken the time to visit the mountain.

He, too, had found nothing unusual.

If not for Ou Daozi, he would not have returned this time.

After gathering information about Ou Daozi’s exact residence, Li Fan and his companions headed straight for Revival Mountain.

Upon arrival, they found the thatched cottage in the mountain abandoned.

"Hmm?" Li Fan frowned slightly.

Sweeping his spiritual sense through the cottage and carefully examining the traces left behind, he discovered that Ou Daozi had only left recently.

Moreover, aside from Ou Daozi, there were signs that another person had been living there as well.

"A child… It should be Ou Daozi’s son." After recalling the relevant information, Li Fan made his judgment.

"But why did they leave in such a hurry…?"

"Could they be fleeing from an enemy?" Li Fan stroked his chin thoughtfully.

"Master, are you looking for the people from this cottage? I can find them," Lin Ling suddenly spoke up.

"Oh? What method do you have?" Li Fan's interest was piqued.

He had just attempted to track them, but Ou Daozi had deliberately erased his traces to prevent pursuit.

"There are many trees in the mountains. We can ask them," Lin Ling said shyly.

With Li Fan’s approval, Lin Ling excitedly cast her spell.

In an instant, countless specks of green light surged from all directions of Revival Mountain.

They gathered like a flowing river of emerald light, pouring into Lin Ling’s body.

"I see them!"

Moments later, Lin Ling clapped her hands excitedly and flew off.

Li Fan and Tianyang followed closely behind.

"Interesting… They didn’t escape using the teleportation formation in Tiancheng. Instead, they fled deeper into the wilderness."

"Was it out of desperation, or is there another reason…?"

Tracing their escape path, Li Fan, who had initially been indifferent, now found himself genuinely intrigued.

Chapter 833: Reversing the Principles of Heaven and Earth

About half a cup of tea’s time later.

Li Fan and his two companions found a hiding place within a cave at the bottom of a deep valley.

The entrance was concealed by a formation, and a secret technique masked any presence.

Even if an ordinary cultivator searched deliberately, it would be difficult to discover the entrance.

However, in front of Li Fan—who possessed the Final Dissociation Disc—and Lin Ling’s group, who could use the myriad trees of the mountain as their ears and eyes, every flaw was laid bare.

Yet, to Li Fan’s surprise once again—

The cave was still empty!

The escape had only occurred recently, and their lingering aura had not yet dissipated.

Li Fan narrowed his eyes.

“This is…?”

“Hiding from me?”

“They knew in advance that I was coming for them?”

“A prophecy? Or perhaps…”

Li Fan suddenly recalled the collapse and reappearance of Revival Mountain.

“Time reversal?”

The moment this thought surfaced, his heart pounded violently.

However, having experienced much, he quickly regained his composure.

“This is merely speculation—it’s not necessarily true.”

“I’ll know the answer once I capture that father and son.”

Driven by an excitement he hadn’t felt in a long time, Li Fan turned to look at Lin Ling.

Lin Ling glanced around, then shook her head. “They haven’t left the cave.”

Hearing this, Li Fan carefully examined the surroundings again. “There are no signs of spatial teleportation either. Could it be…”

Li Fan and Lin Ling simultaneously looked toward the ground beneath them.

A faint smile appeared on Li Fan’s lips as he lazily ordered, “We pursue.”

Lin Ling nodded, green light enveloping her body as she burrowed into the earth.

Logically speaking, underground spaces were dark and disorienting, making it easy to lose one’s pursuers.

However, Li Fan’s group had someone connected to the Earth Vein Ancient Trees—Lin Ling!

Though the underground expanse was vast, it belonged entirely to the Earth Vein Ancient Trees.

Every movement was observed—there was no escape from their sight!

With their guidance, Li Fan’s group quickly picked up on the traces of their targets.

But at the same time, Li Fan noticed that they had only traveled a short distance underground before hastily returning to the surface.

“Did they sense our pursuit again?”

“They’re really troublesome.”

Thinking this, he returned to the surface once more.

This time, Lin Ling sensed that Ou Daozi and his son had taken to the skies, fleeing into the air.

Unfortunately, aerial escape techniques inevitably leave behind fluctuations of spiritual energy.

Soon, Lin Ling pinpointed their direction of escape.

With Li Fan in tow, she gave chase.

No matter how Ou Daozi tried to alter his path or set up diversions, he could not shake off Lin Ling’s tracking.

Finally, it seemed that Ou Daozi and his son had given up struggling and ceased their escape.

They stood still among the clouds ahead, waiting.

“This little one, Lin Ling, is really useful.” Finally catching up, Li Fan couldn’t help but sigh inwardly as he looked at the two figures, one large and one small, in the distance.

“What does senior seek so desperately?” Facing Li Fan’s trio, who had surrounded him, Ou Daozi clasped his hands in greeting without arrogance or fear.

“I originally just wanted your help with a construction project back home,” Li Fan said, narrowing his eyes as he scanned the two of them. “I never expected such an unexpected gain.”

Ou Daozi’s son was only around eight or nine years old. His appearance was not particularly handsome, but despite the faint killing intent emanating from Li Fan, he showed no fear—he carried himself with a natural composure.

More importantly, his gaze was locked onto Li Fan with intense hatred, as if he bore some deep-seated blood feud against him.

Yet they had never met before.

Such an attitude…

It only served to further confirm the suspicions in Li Fan’s mind.

Ou Daozi also noticed his son’s unusual reaction, and his face darkened. He quickly pulled the boy behind him. “I don’t understand what you mean!”

Li Fan snorted coldly. “The collapse and reappearance of Revival Mountain—was that your son’s doing?”

“What exactly is his ability? Could it be the legendary Time Reversal Technique?”

Although Li Fan himself was only a Golden Core Cultivator, both Lin Ling (Dao Integration Realm) and Tianyang (Soul Transformation Realm) followed his lead.

Ou Daozi could not discern Li Fan's true cultivation level and merely said, “Senior, please don’t joke. How could there be such a thing as time flowing in reverse in this world…?”

“As for my son’s divine ability…”

As Ou Daozi spoke, he deliberately lowered his voice but then suddenly fell silent, as if waiting for something!

Li Fan’s heart instantly rang with alarm: “Binding Insect!”

The target was not Ou Daozi but his son!

In an instant, the child lost control of his body, yet his eyes showed no trace of panic.

It was as if everything was within his expectations.

Instead, he looked at Li Fan with a faint hint of mockery.

At the same time, Tianyang’s body suddenly expanded, forming a sphere of intertwining black and red energy that enclosed Li Fan at its center.

“Boom!”

A massive explosion erupted as if something had collided violently.

Li Fan felt momentarily dizzy, while Tianyang’s puppet body developed several cracks.

Fortunately, Lin Ling intervened in time, preventing it from shattering completely.

“What the hell is this?!”

Li Fan cursed under his breath and glanced at his [Truth] Panel—the protective energy level had not decreased.

Instantly, he felt reassured.

In his mind, the Dao Deviation Stone emitted a blue glow, replaying the recorded scene at an extremely slow speed.

Only then did he clearly see the true cause of the sudden turn of events—

And everything that had happened in that fleeting moment.

The assailant, who was so fast that even Lin Ling and Tianyang couldn’t react in time, turned out to be—an arrow.

It seemed that Ou Daozi and his son had long anticipated its flight trajectory.

They had deliberately lingered in place, drawing Li Fan and his group into the arrow’s path.

At the crucial moment, just as the arrow was about to strike Li Fan, a burst of yellow light suddenly radiated from Ou Daozi’s son.

This light appeared to disregard the arrow’s speed, locking onto it with absolute precision.

Then, in that instant, without visibly changing direction, the arrow eerily reversed course—

Shooting back toward its original position!

Wrapped in the golden light, Ou Daozi and his son harnessed the arrow’s unimaginable speed and, in the blink of an eye, escaped from Li Fan’s encirclement!

“Master, they’re gone. They’ve already fled too far, and I can’t sense their presence anymore,” Lin Ling said with some guilt.

Tianyang also shook his head, feeling slightly remorseful.

Li Fan, however, simply waved his hand, unconcerned.

As he replayed the events in his mind, he vaguely grasped the nature of his opponent’s divine ability.

It was not true time reversal…

Or rather, it was related in some way.

It could revert an object’s state to a certain point in time!

To be bested by a seven- or eight-year-old child—Li Fan was not alarmed but rather delighted.

Because since his reincarnation, this was the first cultivator he had encountered whose abilities were linked to the Dao of Time.

“Run? You think you can run?”

“You may escape for now, but you won’t escape forever!”

“Once I set my sights on someone, there is no escape!”

Li Fan’s eyes gleamed, and in an instant, dozens of countermeasures flashed through his mind.

Chapter 834: The Immortal Alliance’s Pursuit and Blockade

Chapter 834: The Immortal Alliance's Pursuit and Blockade

"First, we need to figure out what that arrow was."

Not long after, having made up his mind, Li Fan, through his clone Ji Shaoli’s investigation, spent a great fortune to uncover the answer.

"The Sky-Patrolling Arrow. One of the latest advancements developed by the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance to counter the large-scale assault from the Five Elders Association."

"Its speed is unimaginable. In just a single day, it can complete a full patrol around the Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance's territory. It automatically locks onto suspicious targets, descending from the heavens to deliver a devastating strike."

"Anyone below Dao Integration can be instantly killed. Even Dao Integration cultivators, if caught off guard, will suffer serious injuries on the spot."

Li Fan carefully read through the information on the Sky-Patrolling Arrow, his expression solemn.

"The most crucial part is that these things can be mass-produced. According to estimates, at least five Sky-Patrolling Arrows are currently patrolling the Immortal Alliance's airspace at all times."

"In times of war, they could likely launch dozens of them simultaneously, creating absolute aerial dominance."

Li Fan couldn't help but furrow his brows.

The power of these Sky-Patrolling Arrows was truly terrifying. If not for Tianyang and Lin Ling stepping in to protect him, he would have likely perished on the spot.

Moreover, as a weapon of war, the Sky-Patrolling Arrow came with an immunity clause.

In other words, if one had the misfortune of being in its flight path and got impaled—dying as a result…

No one would be held accountable for the death.

A death in vain.

"From this perspective, it seems that Ou Daozi and his son had nothing to do with the Sky-Patrolling Arrow."

"They simply predicted its trajectory and tried to use it as a tool to kill me while making their escape."

Li Fan nodded to himself.

After understanding the general situation, he began executing his own plan.

Little did Ou Daozi and his son expect that Li Fan’s retaliation would come so swiftly.

And with absolutely no mercy!

In just three days, a certain video spread across nearly the entire Ten Thousand Immortal Alliance.

The shocking content of the video left countless cultivators within the alliance utterly stunned. At the same time, it stirred up both murderous intent and greed within them.

That’s right—Li Fan completely abandoned the idea of personally hunting down Ou Daozi and his son.

Instead, he publicly revealed that they possessed divine treasures and mystical abilities!

By common logic, human nature is greedy and selfish.

Upon learning that someone possesses a supreme treasure, most people would go to great lengths to claim it for themselves.

They would scheme in secret, keeping the information as contained as possible.

Even if they lacked the ability to claim the treasure alone, they would seek allies—or perhaps simply sell the secret for a high price.

In any case, such a matter should only be known within a small circle.

But Li Fan? He completely defied conventional wisdom.

Without a hint of hesitation or greed, he spread the information far and wide within mere days!

From an outsider's perspective, Li Fan’s actions seemed downright foolish and self-defeating.

After all, cultivators are countless in number. Even if Ou Daozi and his son were eventually stripped of their secrets, Li Fan would likely gain nothing from it.

He had given up a golden opportunity to profit—all just to vent his anger.

A reckless move, bordering on madness.

However, in truth, if not for [Truth], Li Fan would never have done such a thing.

But with [Truth] in his possession, he was in no hurry.

Whatever he wanted—he would obtain in due time.

"The boy is indeed troublesome. Let the cultivators of the Immortal Alliance pave the way for me, see if there are any good strategies to capture him."

"In the next life, I will simply imitate him." Li Fan's eyes flickered.

And Li Fan's plan was undeniably effective.

Foreseeing the future, the Art of Time Reversal!
